===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\BusinessObject\BusinessObjectMSKKEXAjanlattetel.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<BusinessObject xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/businessobject">
  <DataTable>msk_kex_ajanlat</DataTable>
  <UniqueIDColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</UniqueIDColumn>
  <Fields>
    <Field name="msk_kex_ajanlatID" />
    <Field name="datum" />
    <Field name="idjelentkezo" />
    <Field name="idelfogadva" />
	<Field name="idtovabbi_egyeztetes" />
	<Field name="PozicioID" />
	<Field name="PozicioIDLast" />
  </Fields>
	<Methods>

		<AfterSave>
			<RunSQL>
					<![CDATA[
					
					
			IF '[##Field.ClickedButton##]'='Save' begin		
					
				IF '[##Filter.JumpType##]' = 'New'
				BEGIN
					update msk_tob_pozicio set StatuszID=30 where PozicioID = '[##Field.PozicioID##]'
					update msk_kex_ajanlat Set PozicioIDLast = '[##Field.PozicioID##]' WHERE msk_kex_ajanlatID = '[##Field.msk_kex_ajanlatID##]'
				end 
				if '[##Field.idelfogadva##]'='5' begin
					update msk_tob_pozicio set StatuszID=32 where PozicioID = '[##Field.PozicioID##]' and StatuszID=30 --csak ha 30-ban volt
					update msk_kex_ajanlat set PozicioID=NULL where msk_kex_ajanlatID = '[##Field.msk_kex_ajanlatID##]' 
				end	
			end
			
			IF '[##Field.ClickedButton##]'='Delete' begin -- SOHA NEM KERÜL IDE MERT MÁR NINCS DELETE GOMB 
				--declare @StatuszID = (select StatuszID from msk_tob_pozicio where PozicioID = '[##Field.PozicioID##]' )
				
				update msk_kex_ajanlat set Deleted=1 where msk_kex_ajanlatID ='[##Field.msk_kex_ajanlatID##]'
				update msk_tob_pozicio set StatuszID=32 where PozicioID = '[##Field.PozicioID##]' and StatuszID=30 --csak ha 30-ban volt
				
			end


			]]>
			</RunSQL>
		</AfterSave>
	</Methods>
	
	
	
</BusinessObject>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\BusinessObject\BusinessObjectMSKKEXFelveteliStatusz.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<BusinessObject xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/businessobject">
  <DataTable>msk_kex_felvstatusz</DataTable>
  <UniqueIDColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</UniqueIDColumn>
  <Fields>
    <Field name="Msk_kex_felvstatuszID" />
    <Field name="Idjelentkezo" />
    <Field name="Idfelvstatusz" />
    <Field name="Datum" />
    <Field name="Belepesdatum" />
    <Field name="Idelutasitasindok" requestValidatorCharacterGroup="Anything" />
    <Field name="Idvisszalepesindok" requestValidatorCharacterGroup="Anything" />
    <Field name="PeopleID" />
    <Field name="VallalatonBeluli" />
  </Fields>
  <Methods>
    <AfterSave>
      <RunSQL>
				  <![CDATA[
          
          declare @origstat int = (select Idfelvstatusz from msk_kex_felvstatusz where Msk_kex_felvstatuszID = '[##Field.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID##]')
          
          if isnull(@origstat,0)=6 begin
              UPDATE msk_kex_felvstatusz SET idelutasitasindok = NULL, idvisszalepesindok = NULL 
              WHERE Msk_kex_felvstatuszID = '[##Field.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID##]'
          end
          if isnull(@origstat,0)=7 begin
              UPDATE msk_kex_felvstatusz SET idvisszalepesindok = NULL, Belepesdatum=NULL 
              WHERE Msk_kex_felvstatuszID = '[##Field.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID##]' 
          end
          if isnull(@origstat,0)=8 begin
              UPDATE msk_kex_felvstatusz SET idelutasitasindok = NULL, Belepesdatum=NULL
              WHERE Msk_kex_felvstatuszID = '[##Field.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID##]' 
          end

/*
              UPDATE msk_kex_felvstatusz SET idelutasitasindok = NULL, idvisszalepesindok = NULL 
              WHERE Msk_kex_felvstatuszID = '[##Field.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID##]' AND Idfelvstatusz = 6;
              UPDATE msk_kex_felvstatusz SET idvisszalepesindok = NULL, Belepesdatum=NULL 
              WHERE Msk_kex_felvstatuszID = '[##Field.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID##]' AND Idfelvstatusz = 7;
              UPDATE msk_kex_felvstatusz SET idelutasitasindok = NULL, Belepesdatum=NULL
              WHERE Msk_kex_felvstatuszID = '[##Field.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID##]' AND Idfelvstatusz = 8;
*/

			  /*84601 84567:
			    Pozicio.statuszID:
 			    30 Foglalt	
                31 Betöltött	
                32 Betöltetlen	
                33 Visszavont
				
				Idfelvstatusz:
				6,7,8 Felvéve, Elutasítva, Visszalépett
			  */
			  DECLARE @PozicioID INT = (SELECT TOP 1 PozicioID /*ISNULL(idelfogadva,0)*/ FROM dbo.msk_kex_ajanlat WHERE deleted=0 AND idjelentkezo='[##Field.Idjelentkezo##]' ORDER BY msk_kex_ajanlatID desc )
			  exec msk_log_insert 'StatuszAftersave:PozicioID',@PozicioID
			  exec msk_log_insert 'StatuszAftersave:idfelvstatusz','[##Field.Idfelvstatusz##]'
			  if '[##Field.Idfelvstatusz##]'='6' begin
			    update msk_tob_pozicio set StatuszID=31 where PozicioID = @PozicioID				
			  end
			  if '[##Field.Idfelvstatusz##]' in ('7','8') begin
			    update msk_tob_pozicio set StatuszID=32 where PozicioID = @PozicioID
				update dbo.msk_kex_ajanlat set PozicioID=NULL WHERE deleted=0 AND idjelentkezo='[##Field.Idjelentkezo##]'
			  end
				
            ]]></RunSQL>
    </AfterSave>
  </Methods>
</BusinessObject>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\BusinessObject\BusinessObjectMSKKEXJelentkezok.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<BusinessObject xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/businessobject">
  <DataTable>msk_kex_jelentkezok</DataTable>
  <UniqueIDColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</UniqueIDColumn>
  <Fields>
    <Field name="msk_kex_jelentkezokID" />
    <Field name="map_hatarido" />
    <Field name="datum" />
    <Field name="gdpr" />
    <Field name="idallasajanlat" />
    <Field name="iddrupal" />
    <Field name="idcv_toborzo" />
    <Field name="idcv_vezeto" />
    <Field name="berigeny" />
    <Field name="idszin" />
    <Field name="idmap_dokumentacio" />
    <Field name="targy" />
    <Field name="hp_torzsszam" />
    <Field name="hp_nev" />
    <Field name="nev" requestValidatorCharacterGroup="Anything" />
    <Field name="email" requestValidatorCharacterGroup="Anything" />
    <Field name="telefonszam" requestValidatorCharacterGroup="Anything" />
    <Field name="cvlinkid" isDocument="true" />
    <Field name="cvtartalom" requestValidatorCharacterGroup="Anything" />
    <Field name="ajanlo_nev" />
    <Field name="honnanertesult" />
    <Field name="cv_toborzo_megj" requestValidatorCharacterGroup="Anything" />
    <Field name="cv_vezeto_megj" requestValidatorCharacterGroup="Anything" />
    <Field name="JelentkezesiDokID" isDocument="true" />
    <Field name="AdatkezelesiDokID" isDocument="true" />
    <Field name="MotivaciosDokID" isDocument="true" />
    <Field name="MunkavallaloiDokID" isDocument="true" />
    <Field name="HashID" />
    <Field name="EmailCC" />
    <Field name="map_beerkezes" />
    <Field name="gdpr_vege" />
    <Field name="MAPCompany" />
    <Field name="MAPEmail" />
    <Field name="MAPPeopleID" />
    <Field name="MAPAjanloszelvenyForrasa" />
    <Field name="MAPErvenyes" />
  </Fields>
  <Methods>
    <BeforeSave>
      <RunSQL><![CDATA[
			  /* GDPR tábla frissítése MAP adatokkal, csak érvényes ajánlás írhat felül érvényest, minden más esetben felülírható */
			  IF '[##Field.gdpr##]'='True' AND 
					(
					('[##Field.MAPErvenyes##]' = 'True' AND (SELECT ISNULL(MAPErvenyes,0) FROM dbo.msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok WHERE HashID = '[##Field.HashID##]' AND Deleted=0) = 1)
					OR 
					((SELECT ISNULL(MAPErvenyes,0) FROM dbo.msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok WHERE HashID = '[##Field.HashID##]' AND Deleted=0) = 0)
					)
				UPDATE dbo.msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok
					SET ajanlo_nev = '[##Field.ajanlo_nev##]',
						MAPCompany = '[##Field.MAPCompany##]',
						MAPEmail = '[##Field.MAPEmail##]',
						map_hatarido = '[##Field.map_hatarido##]',
						idmap_dokumentacio = '[##Field.idmap_dokumentacio##]',
						MAPPeopleID = '[##Field.MAPPeopleID##]',
						map_beerkezes = '[##Field.map_beerkezes##]',
						MAPAjanloszelvenyForrasa = '[##Field.MAPAjanloszelvenyForrasa##]',
						MAPErvenyes = '[##Field.MAPErvenyes##]',
						JelentkezokID = '[##Field.msk_kex_jelentkezokID##]'
				WHERE HashID = '[##Field.HashID##]' AND Deleted=0			  
			  /*KEX adatok átadása MAP-ba*/
			  --IF '[##Field.MAPErvenyes##]' = 'True' AND (SELECT ISNULL(MAPErvenyes,0) FROM dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID = '[##Field.msk_kex_jelentkezokID##]') = 0
				--EXEC msk_map_importfromkex '[##Field.msk_kex_jelentkezokID##]', '[##Field.MAPPeopleID##]'		
				]]>      </RunSQL>
    </BeforeSave>
    <AfterSave>
      <RunSQL>
        <![CDATA[
			  /*UPDATE Trigger-ből kivezetés került a gdpr tábla velöltésre, helyette az alábbi tárolt fut le egyszer a jelentkező manuális felvételekor*/
			  IF  '[##Field.PressedButton##]'='Save'					
				BEGIN
					EXEC [dbo].[msp_kex_gdpr_feltoltes] @JelentkezoID='[##Field.msk_kex_jelentkezokID##]'
				END			

			  /* GDPR tábla frissítése MAP adatokkal, csak érvényes ajánlás írhat felül érvényest, minden más esetben felülírható */
			  IF '[##Field.gdpr##]'='True' AND 
					(
					('[##Field.MAPErvenyes##]' = 'True' AND (SELECT ISNULL(MAPErvenyes,0) FROM dbo.msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok WHERE HashID = '[##Field.HashID##]' AND Deleted=0) = 1)
					OR 
					((SELECT ISNULL(MAPErvenyes,0) FROM dbo.msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok WHERE HashID = '[##Field.HashID##]' AND Deleted=0) = 0)
					)
				BEGIN
				  UPDATE dbo.msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok SET cvlinkid=j.cvlinkid, JelentkezesiDokID=j.JelentkezesiDokID, AdatkezelesiDokID=j.AdatkezelesiDokID, MotivaciosDokID=j.MotivaciosDokID
				  FROM dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok j
				  WHERE dbo.msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok.HashID='[##Field.HashID##]' AND j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Field.msk_kex_jelentkezokID##]';
			  
				  /* GDPR tĂĄbla frissĂ­tĂŠse MAP adatokkal (BeforeSave mellett itt is kell, mivel a dokumentumID csak a mentĂŠs utĂĄn jĂśn lĂŠtre) */
				  UPDATE dbo.msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok
						SET MunkavallaloiDokID = (SELECT MunkavallaloiDokID FROM dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID = '[##Field.msk_kex_jelentkezokID##]')
				  WHERE msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok.HashID = '[##Field.HashID##]' AND msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok.Deleted=0
				END			  
			  /*KEX adatok frissítése MAP-ba*/
			  IF '[##Field.MAPErvenyes##]' = 'True'
				EXEC msk_map_importfromkex '[##Field.msk_kex_jelentkezokID##]', '[##Field.MAPPeopleID##]'			
        
			]]>
      </RunSQL>
    </AfterSave>
  </Methods>
</BusinessObject>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\BusinessObject\BusinessObjectMSKKEXOrvosi.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<BusinessObject xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/businessobject">
  <DataTable>msk_kex_orvosi</DataTable>
  <UniqueIDColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</UniqueIDColumn>
  <Fields>
    <Field name="msk_kex_orvosiID" />
    <Field name="datum" />
    <Field name="idjelentkezo">
      <DefaultValue type="Constant" return="int" default="0">1</DefaultValue>
    </Field>
    <Field name="idorvositipus" />
    <Field name="idelkezdte" />
    <Field name="ideredmeny" />
    <Field name="igenylesdatuma" />
    <Field name="kiallitasdatuma" />
  </Fields>
  <Methods>
    <OnValidate type="SQL" return="string" default="">
        <![CDATA[
          IF (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [dbo].[msk_kex_orvosi] [MKO] WHERE [MKO].[idjelentkezo]='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]' AND [MKO].[msk_kex_orvosiID]<>'[##Field.msk_kex_orvosiID##]'
          AND ISNULL([MKO].[idelkezdte],0)<>5 AND ISNULL([MKO].[ideredmeny],0)=0 AND [MKO].[Deleted]=0)
          OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [dbo].[msk_kex_orvosi] [MKO] WHERE [MKO].[idjelentkezo]='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]' AND [MKO].[msk_kex_orvosiID]<>'[##Field.msk_kex_orvosiID##]'
          AND ISNULL([MKO].[idelkezdte],0)=4 AND ISNULL([MKO].[ideredmeny],0)<>5 AND [MKO].[Deleted]=0))
          SELECT 'A jelentkezőnek van folyamatban lévő orvosija.'
            	]]>
    </OnValidate>
  </Methods>
</BusinessObject>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\ComboDefinition\ComboMSKKEXallasajanlatLezaras.xml =====

<ComboDefinition Name="ComboCsoport" xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/combodefinition">
  <SourceType>Database</SourceType>
  <Source>
    <Database>
      <SelectionString>
        SELECT TOP (1000) [Msk_kex_lezarasindokokID]
        ,[Indokok]
        ,[Deleted]
        FROM [dbo].[msk_kex_lezarasindokok]			ORDER BY Indokok
      </SelectionString>
      <KeyColumn>Msk_kex_lezarasindokokID</KeyColumn>
      <ValueColumn>Indokok</ValueColumn>
    </Database>
  </Source>
</ComboDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\ComboDefinition\ComboMSKKEXAllasajanlatok.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ComboDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/combodefinition">
  <SourceType>Database</SourceType>
  <Source>
    <Database>
      <SelectionString><![CDATA[
          SELECT distinct a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID, a.targy
          FROM msk_kex_allasajanlatok as a WITH(NOLOCK)
          where a.targy<>' '  AND 1=1
		      ORDER BY a.targy
				]]></SelectionString>
      <KeyColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</KeyColumn>
      <ValueColumn>Targy</ValueColumn>
    </Database>
  </Source>
</ComboDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\ComboDefinition\ComboMSKKEXElutasitasiIndokok.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ComboDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/combodefinition">
  <SourceType>Database</SourceType>
  <Source>
    <Database>
      <SelectionString>SELECT msk_kex_elutasitasindokokID, nev FROM msk_kex_elutasitasindokok WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE Deleted = 0 AND 1=1	 ORDER BY nev	</SelectionString>
      <KeyColumn>msk_kex_elutasitasindokokID</KeyColumn>
      <ValueColumn>nev</ValueColumn>
    </Database>
  </Source>
</ComboDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\ComboDefinition\ComboMSKKEXJelolt.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ComboDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/combodefinition">
  <SourceType>Database</SourceType>
  <Source>
    <Database>
      <SelectionString><![CDATA[
        IF '[##Session.UserID##]' IN (SELECT DISTINCT p.PeopleID
        FROM People as p LEFT JOIN PeopleGroupsPeople as pgp ON p.PeopleID=pgp.PeopleID left JOIN People as pp ON pgp.GroupID=pp.PeopleID
        WHERE pp.TechnicalName='Group_ITA')
        BEGIN
		      SELECT distinct j.NEV
          FROM msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok as j WITH(NOLOCK)
          where j.NEV<>'' AND (Idanonindok IS NULL OR Idanonindok = 0 OR Idanonindok = '') 
          AND 1=1 
          ORDER BY j.NEV
        END
        ELSE
        BEGIN
			    SELECT distinct j.NEV
          FROM msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok as j WITH(NOLOCK)
		      LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_allasajanlatok a ON a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID=j.idallasajanlat
		      LEFT JOIN dbo.orn_SZI_Company c ON c.AllasVallalatKod=a.idceg
          where j.NEV<>'' AND (Idanonindok IS NULL OR Idanonindok = 0 OR Idanonindok = '') 
          AND c.VallalatKod = (SELECT BUKRS FROM People Where PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]')
          AND 1=1 
          ORDER BY j.NEV
        END
				]]></SelectionString>
      <KeyColumn>Nev</KeyColumn>
      <ValueColumn>Nev</ValueColumn>
    </Database>
  </Source>
</ComboDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\ComboDefinition\ComboMSKKEXMailTemplate.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ComboDefinition Name="ComboMailTemplate" xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/combodefinition">
  <SourceType>Database</SourceType>
  <Source>
    <Database>
      <SelectionString><![CDATA[
          DECLARE @SessionUserID int = '[##Session.UserID##]'
          DECLARE @BUKRS VARCHAR(10) = (SELECT TOP 1 BUKRS FROM dbo.People WHERE PeopleID=@SessionUserID)
          DECLARE @CompanyID INT = (SELECT TOP 1 CompanyID FROM dbo.orn_SZI_Company WHERE VallalatKod = @BUKRS)
          DECLARE @RovidNev VARCHAR(40) = (SELECT TOP 1 RovidNev FROM dbo.msk_Company WHERE BUKRS=@BUKRS)

          SELECT *, et.EmailTemplateSampleID, et.TemplateName
          FROM orn_szi_EmailTemplateSample et WITH(NOLOCK)
          LEFT JOIN dbo.orn_SZI_Company oc ON oc.CompanyID=et.CompanyID
          LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_Company mc ON mc.BUKRS=oc.VallalatKod
          WHERE
          mc.BUKRS=@BUKRS AND
          et.technical_name=CONCAT('kex_',@RovidNev) AND
          et.Active=1 AND et.Deleted = 0 AND oc.Deleted=0 AND 1=1 ORDER BY et.TemplateName
        ]]></SelectionString>
      <KeyColumn>EmailTemplateSampleID</KeyColumn>
      <ValueColumn>TemplateName</ValueColumn>
    </Database>
  </Source>
</ComboDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\ComboDefinition\ComboMSKKEXMjgy.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ComboDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/combodefinition">
  <SourceType>Database</SourceType>
  <Source>
    <Database>
      <SelectionString><![CDATA[
        IF '[##Session.UserID##]' IN (SELECT DISTINCT p.PeopleID
        FROM People as p LEFT JOIN PeopleGroupsPeople as pgp ON p.PeopleID=pgp.PeopleID left JOIN People as pp ON pgp.GroupID=pp.PeopleID
        WHERE pp.TechnicalName='Group_ITA'
        AND p.Deleted=0 AND pgp.Deleted=0 AND pp.Deleted=0)
        BEGIN
          SELECT DISTINCT
          v.Idvezeto
          ,p.Name    
          FROM dbo.msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok AS v
          LEFT join People p ON v.Idvezeto = p.PeopleID
          WHERE
          v.Mjgy= 10 AND dbo.msk_aktivPeopleID(p.PeopleID)='true'
          AND v.Deleted=0 AND 1=1 ORDER BY p.Name
        END
        ELSE
        BEGIN
          SELECT DISTINCT
          v.Idvezeto
          ,p.Name    
          FROM dbo.msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok AS v
          LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_allasajanlatok a ON a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID = v.idallasajanlat
          LEFT JOIN dbo.orn_SZI_Company c ON c.AllasVallalatKod=a.idceg
          LEFT join People p ON v.Idvezeto = p.PeopleID
          WHERE
          v.Mjgy= 10 AND dbo.msk_aktivPeopleID(p.PeopleID)='true'
          AND c.VallalatKod = (SELECT BUKRS FROM People Where PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]')
          AND v.Deleted=0 AND 1=1 ORDER BY p.Name
        END
				]]></SelectionString>
      <KeyColumn>Idvezeto</KeyColumn>
      <ValueColumn>Name</ValueColumn>
    </Database>
  </Source>
</ComboDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\ComboDefinition\ComboMSKKEXPeople.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ComboDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/combodefinition">
  <SourceType>Database</SourceType>
  <Source>
    <Database>
      <SelectionString><![CDATA[
        IF '[##Session.UserID##]' IN (SELECT DISTINCT p.PeopleID
        FROM People as p LEFT JOIN PeopleGroupsPeople as pgp ON p.PeopleID=pgp.PeopleID left JOIN People as pp ON pgp.GroupID=pp.PeopleID
        WHERE pp.TechnicalName='Group_ITA')
        BEGIN
        SELECT DISTINCT
        p.PeopleID, p.Name
        FROM People as p LEFT JOIN PeopleGroupsPeople as pgp ON p.PeopleID=pgp.PeopleID left JOIN People as pp ON pgp.GroupID=pp.PeopleID
        WHERE
        (pp.TechnicalName='Group_KEXTOB'
        OR p.PeopleID IN (SELECT Idvezeto FROM msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok WHERE Deleted=0))
        AND p.Deleted=0 AND dbo.msk_aktivPeopleID(p.PeopleID)='true'
        AND 1=1 ORDER BY p.Name
        END
        ELSE
        BEGIN
        SELECT DISTINCT
        p.PeopleID, p.Name
        FROM People as p LEFT JOIN PeopleGroupsPeople as pgp ON p.PeopleID=pgp.PeopleID left JOIN People as pp ON pgp.GroupID=pp.PeopleID
        WHERE
        (pp.TechnicalName='Group_KEXTOB'
        OR p.PeopleID IN (SELECT Idvezeto FROM msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok WHERE Deleted=0))
        AND p.Deleted=0 AND dbo.msk_aktivPeopleID(p.PeopleID)='true'
        AND p.BUKRS=(SELECT BUKRS FROM People Where PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]')
        AND 1=1 ORDER BY p.Name
        END]]></SelectionString>
      <KeyColumn>PeopleID</KeyColumn>
      <ValueColumn>Name</ValueColumn>
    </Database>
  </Source>
</ComboDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\ComboDefinition\ComboMSKKEXPeopleIDNev.xml =====

      </SelectionString>

      <ValueColumn>Name</ValueColumn>
    </Database>
  </Source>
</ComboDefinition>

        <![CDATA[
          SELECT t0.PozicioID as key_msk_tob_pozicio, concat('', t0.Iktatoszam) as combo_msk_tob_pozicio                   
                  from msk_tob_pozicio t0  WHERE t0.Deleted=0 
                  AND t0.Iktatoszam IS NOT NULL
                  AND 1=1 ORDER BY 2
          ]]>
      </SelectionString>
      <KeyColumn>key_msk_tob_pozicio</KeyColumn>

    </Database>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\ComboDefinition\ComboMSKKEXStvezeto.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ComboDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/combodefinition">
  <SourceType>Database</SourceType>
  <Source>
    <Database>
      <SelectionString><![CDATA[
        IF '[##Session.UserID##]' IN (SELECT DISTINCT p.PeopleID
        FROM People as p LEFT JOIN PeopleGroupsPeople as pgp ON p.PeopleID=pgp.PeopleID left JOIN People as pp ON pgp.GroupID=pp.PeopleID
        WHERE pp.TechnicalName='Group_ITA'
        AND p.Deleted=0 AND pgp.Deleted=0 AND pp.Deleted=0)
        BEGIN
          SELECT distinct
          av.idvezeto
          ,p.Name
          FROM dbo.msk_kex_allasajanlatok AS a
          LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok AS av ON av.Idallasajanlat=a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID
          LEFT join People p ON av.Idvezeto = p.PeopleID
          WHERE
          a.Deleted=0 AND av.Deleted=0 AND av.Statuszolovezeto=1 AND dbo.msk_aktivPeopleID(p.PeopleID)='true'
          AND 1=1
          ORDER BY p.Name
        END
        ELSE
        BEGIN
          SELECT distinct
          av.idvezeto
          ,p.Name
          FROM dbo.msk_kex_allasajanlatok AS a
          LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok AS av ON av.Idallasajanlat=a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID
          LEFT join People p ON av.Idvezeto = p.PeopleID
          WHERE
          a.Deleted=0 AND av.Deleted=0 AND av.Statuszolovezeto=1 AND dbo.msk_aktivPeopleID(p.PeopleID)='true'
          AND p.BUKRS=(SELECT BUKRS FROM People Where PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]')
          AND 1=1
          ORDER BY p.Name
        END
				]]></SelectionString>
      <KeyColumn>Idvezeto</KeyColumn>
      <ValueColumn>Name</ValueColumn>
    </Database>
  </Source>
</ComboDefinition>

<ComboDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/combodefinition">
  <SourceType>Database</SourceType>
  <Source>
    <Database>
      <SelectionString><![CDATA[
        IF '[##Session.UserID##]' IN (SELECT DISTINCT p.PeopleID
        FROM People as p LEFT JOIN PeopleGroupsPeople as pgp ON p.PeopleID=pgp.PeopleID left JOIN People as pp ON pgp.GroupID=pp.PeopleID
        WHERE pp.TechnicalName='Group_ITA'
        AND p.Deleted=0 AND pgp.Deleted=0 AND pp.Deleted=0)
        BEGIN
          SELECT DISTINCT
          p.PeopleID, p.Name
          FROM People as p LEFT JOIN PeopleGroupsPeople as pgp ON p.PeopleID=pgp.PeopleID left JOIN People as pp ON pgp.GroupID=pp.PeopleID
          WHERE
          pp.TechnicalName='Group_KEXTOB' AND dbo.msk_aktivPeopleID(p.PeopleID)='true'
          AND p.Deleted=0 AND pgp.Deleted=0 AND pp.Deleted=0 AND dbo.msk_aktivPeopleID(p.PeopleID)='true' AND 1=1 ORDER BY p.Name
        END
        ELSE
        BEGIN
          SELECT DISTINCT
          p.PeopleID, p.Name
          FROM People as p LEFT JOIN PeopleGroupsPeople as pgp ON p.PeopleID=pgp.PeopleID left JOIN People as pp ON pgp.GroupID=pp.PeopleID
          WHERE
          pp.TechnicalName='Group_KEXTOB' AND dbo.msk_aktivPeopleID(p.PeopleID)='true'
          AND p.Deleted=0 AND pgp.Deleted=0 AND pp.Deleted=0 AND dbo.msk_aktivPeopleID(p.PeopleID)='true' AND p.BUKRS=(SELECT BUKRS FROM People Where PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]') AND 1=1 ORDER BY p.Name
        END
				]]></SelectionString>
      <KeyColumn>PeopleID</KeyColumn>
      <ValueColumn>Name</ValueColumn>
    </Database>
  </Source>
</ComboDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\ComboDefinition\ComboMSKKEXValutaKodok.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ComboDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/combodefinition">
  <SourceType>Database</SourceType>
  <Source>
    <Database>
      <SelectionString>SELECT Msk_kki_valutaID, Valuta FROM Msk_kki_valuta WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE Deleted = 0 AND 1=1	ORDER BY Valuta	</SelectionString>
      <KeyColumn>Msk_kki_valutaID</KeyColumn>
      <ValueColumn>Valuta</ValueColumn>
    </Database>
  </Source>
</ComboDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\ComboDefinition\ComboMSKKEXVisszalepesiIndokok.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ComboDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/combodefinition">
  <SourceType>Database</SourceType>
  <Source>
    <Database>
      <SelectionString>SELECT msk_kex_visszalepesindokokID, nev FROM msk_kex_visszalepesindokok WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE Deleted = 0 AND 1=1	ORDER BY nev	</SelectionString>
      <KeyColumn>msk_kex_visszalepesindokokID</KeyColumn>
      <ValueColumn>nev</ValueColumn>
    </Database>
  </Source>
</ComboDefinition>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<Component xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/component">
  <Tabs>
    <Tab id="CVDocument">
      <Caption>CV</Caption>
      <ResourceName>EWDMSKKEXCVDocument</ResourceName>
      <Visible type="SQL" return="boolean"><![CDATA[SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT cvlinkid FROM msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]') IS NULL
      OR (SELECT cvlinkid FROM msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]') = 0
      THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END]]></Visible>
    </Tab>
    <Tab id="JelentkezesiLap">
      <Caption>Jelentkezési lap</Caption>
      <ResourceName>EWDMSKKEXJelentkezesiLap</ResourceName>
      <!--<Visible type="Constant" return="boolean" default="false">false</Visible>-->
      <Visible type="SQL" return="boolean"><![CDATA[SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT JelentkezesiDokID FROM msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]') IS NULL
      OR (SELECT JelentkezesiDokID FROM msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]') = 0
      THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END]]></Visible>
    </Tab>
    <Tab id="AdatkezelesiNyilatkozat">
      <Caption>Adatkezelési nyilatkozat</Caption>
      <ResourceName>EWDMSKKEXAdatkezelesiNyilatkozat</ResourceName>
      <Visible type="SQL" return="boolean"><![CDATA[SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT AdatkezelesiDokID FROM msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]') IS NULL
      OR (SELECT AdatkezelesiDokID FROM msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]') = 0
      THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END]]></Visible>
    </Tab>
    <Tab id="MotivaciosLevel">
      <Caption>Motivációs levél</Caption>
      <ResourceName>EWDMSKKEXMotivaciosLevel</ResourceName>
      <Visible type="SQL" return="boolean"><![CDATA[SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT MotivaciosDokID FROM msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]') IS NULL
      OR (SELECT MotivaciosDokID FROM msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]') = 0 
      THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END]]></Visible>
    </Tab>
    <Tab id="MunkavallaloiAjanlas">
      <Caption>Munkavállalói ajánlás</Caption>
      <ResourceName>EWDMSKKEXMunkavallaloiAjanlas</ResourceName>
      <Visible type="SQL" return="boolean"><![CDATA[SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT MunkavallaloiDokID FROM msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]') IS NULL
      OR (SELECT MunkavallaloiDokID FROM msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]') = 0
      THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END]]></Visible>
    </Tab>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXAjanlattetel.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect distinct="true">
    FROM msk_kex_ajanlat as a
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as le ON a.idelfogadva = le.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as lt ON a.idtovabbi_egyeztetes = lt.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok j ON j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID=a.idjelentkezo
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok g ON g.HashID=j.HashID
    WHERE a.Deleted=0 AND 1=1</SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_ajanlatID">
      <Definition>a.[msk_kex_ajanlatID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_ajanlatID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idjelentkezo">
      <Definition>a.[idjelentkezo]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="datum">
      <Definition>a.[datum]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idelfogadva">
      <Definition>a.[idelfogadva]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idelfogadva_ajanlat_LookupValue">
      <Definition>le.[LookupValue] as idelfogadva_ajanlat_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idtovabbi_egyeztetes">
      <Definition>a.[idtovabbi_egyeztetes]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idtovabbi_egyeztetes_ajanlat_LookupValue">
      <Definition>lt.[LookupValue] as idtovabbi_egyeztetes_ajanlat_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>a.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idallasajanlat">
      <Definition>j.[idallasajanlat]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>a.[idjelentkezo]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>g.[msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>j.[idallasajanlat]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
	  <ForwardedFilter>
		  <Alias>Msk_tob_keresesikerelemID_ID</Alias>
		  <AsType>Param</AsType>
	  </ForwardedFilter>
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXAjanloszelvenyforrasa.xml =====

  <SqlSelect>FROM msk_kex_ajanloszelvenyforrasa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Deleted=0 AND 1=1</SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="AjanloszelvenyforrasaID">
      <Definition>[AjanloszelvenyforrasaID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>AjanloszelvenyforrasaID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>AjanloszelvenyforrasaID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="nev">
      <Definition>[nev]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>AjanloszelvenyforrasaID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>AjanloszelvenyforrasaID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>AjanloszelvenyforrasaID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[AjanloszelvenyforrasaID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXalapriport.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <!--<SqlSelect>FROM msk_kex_allasajanlatok_alap WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1</SqlSelect>-->
  <SqlSelect distinct="true" type="StoredProcedure">dbo.msk_kex_sel_allasajanlatokalapriport '[##Session.UserID##]',</SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_allasajanlatokID">
      <Definition>[msk_kex_allasajanlatokID]</Definition>

      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="datum_lejarat">
      <Definition>format(datum_lejarat,'yyyy.MM.dd') as datum_lejarat</Definition>
      <!--<Definition>datum_lejarat</Definition>-->
      <!--<Format>Date</Format>-->
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>

    </Column>

    </Column>

      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idtoborzo2">
      <Definition>[idtoborzo2]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idceg">
      <Definition>[idceg]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="link">

      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>

        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>

    </InFilter>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXallasajanlatok.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect distinct="true">
	  FROM msk_kex_allasajanlatok as a
	  left join msk_tob_allashirdetesek h on h.Msk_tob_allashirdetesekID=a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID
	  LEFT JOIN People as p ON a.idtoborzo1 = p.PeopleID
	  LEFT JOIN People as p2 ON a.idtoborzo2 = p2.PeopleID
	  left join (select distinct [idallasajanlat] from msk_kex_jelentkezok where idszin=5 and deleted=0) j on j.idallasajanlat=a.[msk_kex_allasajanlatokID]
	  LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok v ON v.Idallasajanlat=a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID AND v.Deleted=0
	  WHERE a.Deleted=0 AND 1=1
  </SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_allasajanlatokID">
      <Definition>a.[msk_kex_allasajanlatokID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <!--<Column name="uzletag">
      <Definition>a.[uzletag]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>-->
    <Column name="targy">
      <Definition>a.[targy]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <!--<Column name="leiras">
      <Definition>a.[leiras]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>-->
    <Column name="hely">
      <Definition>a.[hely]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <!--<Column name="idkategoria">
      <Definition>a.[idkategoria]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idceg">
      <Definition>a.[idceg]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>

    </Column>
    <Column name="szin">
      <Definition><![CDATA[
        (select case 
        WHEN a.idtoborzo1 IS NULL AND a.idtoborzo2 IS NULL THEN 1 
        WHEN a.idtoborzo1 = [##Session.UserID##] OR a.idtoborzo2 = [##Session.UserID##] THEN 2 
        WHEN EXISTS(SELECT * FROM dbo.msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok WHERE Idallasajanlat=a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID AND deleted=0 and idvezeto=[##Session.UserID##]) THEN 3
		    ELSE 4
        END) 
        as szin
        ]]></Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idtoborzo1">

      <Definition>p2.[Name] as toborzo2_nev</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="jelentkezo_count">
      <Definition>(select count(*) as jelentkezo_count from msk_kex_jelentkezok h1 where h1.idallasajanlat=a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID AND h1.Deleted = 0) as jelentkezo_count</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idmunkaltato">
      <Definition>a.[idmunkaltato]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>idmunkaltato_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="felveve_count">
      <Definition><![CDATA[(select COUNT(fs.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID) as felveve_count from msk_kex_felvstatusz fs LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok h1 ON h1.msk_kex_jelentkezokID=fs.Idjelentkezo
        WHERE fs.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID IN (SELECT MAX(Msk_kex_felvstatuszID) FROM msk_kex_felvstatusz WHERE Deleted=0 GROUP BY Idjelentkezo)
        AND h1.idallasajanlat=a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID AND fs.Idfelvstatusz=6) as felveve_count]]></Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="statusz_nelkul">
      <Definition>case when j.idallasajanlat is null then 'False' else 'True' END as statusz_nelkul</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="statusz_nelkul_ikon">
      <Definition>case when j.idallasajanlat is null then '' else 'w' END as statusz_nelkul_ikon</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="felveve_count_szin">
      <Definition><![CDATA[
        ( select case when 
        (a.poziciok_szama - (select COUNT(fs.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID) as felveve_count from msk_kex_felvstatusz fs LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok h1 ON h1.msk_kex_jelentkezokID=fs.Idjelentkezo
        WHERE fs.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID IN (SELECT MAX(Msk_kex_felvstatuszID) FROM msk_kex_felvstatusz WHERE Deleted=0 GROUP BY Idjelentkezo)
        AND h1.idallasajanlat=a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID AND fs.Idfelvstatusz=6) <0)
        then '#ff0000' else '#000000' end )
        as felveve_count_szin
        ]]></Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
	  <Column name="idlezarasindok">
		  <Definition>a.[Idlezarasindok]</Definition>
		  <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
	  </Column>
	  <Column name="idkeresesikerelem">
		  <Definition>h.[idkeresesikerelem]</Definition>
		  <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
		  <OutFilter>
			  <Alias>Msk_tob_keresesikerelemID_ID</Alias>
			  <Type>Out</Type>
		  </OutFilter>
	  </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>a.[msk_kex_allasajanlatokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
	<ForwardedFilters>
		<ForwardedFilter>
			<Alias>Msk_tob_keresesikerelemID_ID</Alias>
			<AsType>Out</AsType>
		</ForwardedFilter>
	</ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXallasajanlatokDisplay.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect distinct="true">
    FROM msk_kex_allasajanlatok as a
    LEFT JOIN People as p ON a.idtoborzo1 = p.PeopleID
    LEFT JOIN People as p2 ON a.idtoborzo2 = p2.PeopleID
    left join (select distinct [idallasajanlat] from msk_kex_jelentkezok where idszin=5 and deleted=0) j on j.idallasajanlat=a.[msk_kex_allasajanlatokID]
    LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok v ON v.Idallasajanlat=a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID
    WHERE a.Deleted=0 AND 1=1
  </SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_allasajanlatokID">
      <Definition>a.[msk_kex_allasajanlatokID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <!--<Column name="uzletag">
      <Definition>a.[uzletag]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>-->

      <Definition>a.[targy]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>

    </Column>-->
    <Column name="felveve_count">
      <Definition><![CDATA[(select COUNT(fs.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID) as felveve_count from msk_kex_felvstatusz fs LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok h1 ON h1.msk_kex_jelentkezokID=fs.Idjelentkezo
        WHERE fs.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID IN (SELECT MAX(Msk_kex_felvstatuszID) FROM msk_kex_felvstatusz WHERE Deleted=0 GROUP BY Idjelentkezo)
        AND h1.idallasajanlat=a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID AND fs.Idfelvstatusz=6) as felveve_count]]></Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <!--<Column name="statusz_nelkul">
      <Definition>case when j.idallasajanlat is null then 'False' else 'True' END as statusz_nelkul</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>-->
    <Column name="statusz_nelkul_ikon">
      <Definition>case when j.idallasajanlat is null then '' else 'w' END as statusz_nelkul_ikon</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="felveve_count_szin">
      <Definition><![CDATA[
        ( select case when 
        (a.poziciok_szama - (select COUNT(fs.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID) as felveve_count from msk_kex_felvstatusz fs LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok h1 ON h1.msk_kex_jelentkezokID=fs.Idjelentkezo
        WHERE fs.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID IN (SELECT MAX(Msk_kex_felvstatuszID) FROM msk_kex_felvstatusz WHERE Deleted=0 GROUP BY Idjelentkezo)
        AND h1.idallasajanlat=a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID AND fs.Idfelvstatusz=6) <0)
        then '#ff0000' else '#000000' end )
        as felveve_count_szin
        ]]></Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <!--<Column name="idlezarasindok">
      <Definition>a.[Idlezarasindok]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>-->
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>a.[msk_kex_allasajanlatokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXAnon.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect distinct="true"> 
        FROM msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok as g
			 LEFT JOIN msk_kex_allasajanlatok as a on g.idallasajanlat = a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID 			 
			 WHERE g.Deleted=0 AND (g.Idanonindok is null or g.Idanonindok=0) AND 1=1
  </SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID">
      <Definition>g.[msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idallasajanlat">
      <Definition>g.[idallasajanlat]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Idanonindok">
      <Definition>g.[idanonindok]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>Idanonindok_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>g.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

  <Columns>
    <Column name="id">
      <Definition>id</Definition>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>id</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
      <IdColumn>id</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="value">
      <Definition>value</Definition>
      <IdColumn>id</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>value</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXCsoportosAjanlattetel.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect type="StoredProcedure">
    msk_defaultMultipleSelection @ID='csoportosajanlattetel', <!--csak a LOG beazonosítása miatt-->
    @SelectionString='
    FROM msk_kex_ajanlat as a
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as le ON a.idelfogadva = le.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as lt ON a.idtovabbi_egyeztetes = lt.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok as j on j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID = a.idjelentkezo
    WHERE a.Deleted=0 AND 1=1' ,
    @UserID=[##Session.UserID##] ,
  </SqlSelect>
  <!--<SqlSelect>FROM msk_kex_ajanlat as a 
			  LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as le ON a.idelfogadva = le.LookupListID 
			  LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as lt ON a.idtovabbi_egyeztetes = lt.LookupListID 
			  WHERE a.Deleted=0 AND 1=1</SqlSelect>-->
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_ajanlatID">
      <Definition>a.[msk_kex_ajanlatID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_ajanlatID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idjelentkezo">
      <Definition>a.[idjelentkezo]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="datum">
      <Definition>a.[datum]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idelfogadva">
      <Definition>a.[idelfogadva]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idelfogadva_ajanlat_LookupValue">
      <Definition>le.[LookupValue] as idelfogadva_ajanlat_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idtovabbi_egyeztetes">
      <Definition>a.[idtovabbi_egyeztetes]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idtovabbi_egyeztetes_ajanlat_LookupValue">
      <Definition>lt.[LookupValue] as idtovabbi_egyeztetes_ajanlat_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>a.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="neve">
      <Definition>j.[nev] as neve</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="csoportos">
      <Definition>1 as csoportos</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_ajanlatID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>csoportos</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>a.[idjelentkezo]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>csoportos</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXCsoportosFelveteliStatusz.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect type="StoredProcedure">
    msk_defaultMultipleSelection @ID='csoportosFelvetelistatusz', <!--csak a LOG beazonosítása miatt-->
    @SelectionString='
    FROM msk_kex_felvstatusz f 
    LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_LookupList l ON f.Idfelvstatusz=l.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_elutasitasindokok e ON f.Idelutasitasindok=e.msk_kex_elutasitasindokokID
    LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_visszalepesindokok v ON f.Idvisszalepesindok=v.msk_kex_visszalepesindokokID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok as j on j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID = f.idjelentkezo
    WHERE f.Deleted=0 AND 1=1' ,
    @UserID=[##Session.UserID##] ,
  </SqlSelect>
  <!--<SqlSelect>
    FROM msk_kex_felvstatusz f LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_LookupList l ON f.Idfelvstatusz=l.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_elutasitasindokok e ON f.Idelutasitasindok=e.msk_kex_elutasitasindokokID
    LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_visszalepesindokok v ON f.Idvisszalepesindok=v.msk_kex_visszalepesindokokID
    WHERE f.Deleted=0 AND 1=1
  </SqlSelect>-->
  <Columns>
    <Column name="Msk_kex_felvstatuszID">
      <Definition>f.[Msk_kex_felvstatuszID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Idjelentkezo">
      <Definition>f.[Idjelentkezo]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Idfelvstatusz">
      <Definition>f.[Idfelvstatusz]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Felvstatusz">
      <Definition>l.[LookupValue] as Felvstatusz</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Datum">
      <Definition>f.[Datum]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Belepesdatum">
      <Definition>f.[Belepesdatum]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Idelutasitasindok">
      <Definition>f.[Idelutasitasindok]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Elutasitasindok">
      <Definition>e.[nev] as Elutasitasindok</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Idvisszalepesindok">
      <Definition>f.[Idvisszalepesindok]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Visszalepesindok">
      <Definition>v.[nev] as Visszalepesindok</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Statuszindoka">
      <Definition><![CDATA[
        (SELECT CASE
        WHEN ISNULL(e.[nev],'') <> '' THEN e.[nev]
        WHEN ISNULL(v.[nev],'') <> '' THEN v.[nev]
        else
        ''
        end) 
        as Statuszindoka
        ]]></Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>f.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="neve">
      <Definition>j.[nev] as neve</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="csoportos">
      <Definition>1 as csoportos</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>csoportos</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[idjelentkezo]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>csoportos</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <!--<SqlSelect type="Select">FROM msk_kex_interju as i 
			  LEFT JOIN amsk_kex_LookupList as lm ON i.idmegjelent = lm.LookupListID 
			  LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as le ON i.ideredmeny = le.LookupListID 
        LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok as j on j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID = i.idjelentkezo
			  WHERE i.Deleted=0 AND 1=1</SqlSelect>-->
  <!--<SqlSelect type="StoredProcedure">msk_kex_sel_csoportosinterju '[##Session.UserID##]' ,</SqlSelect>-->
  <!--<SqlSelect type="StoredProcedure">msk_kex_sel_csoportosinterju [##Session.UserID##] ,</SqlSelect>-->
  <SqlSelect type="StoredProcedure">msk_defaultMultipleSelection @ID='csoportosinterju', <!--csak a LOG beazonosítása miatt-->
        @SelectionString='
          FROM msk_kex_interju as i 
			      LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as lm ON i.idmegjelent = lm.LookupListID 
			      LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as le ON i.ideredmeny = le.LookupListID 
            LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok as j on j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID = i.idjelentkezo
			    WHERE i.Deleted=0 AND 1=1' , 
        @UserID=[##Session.UserID##] ,</SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_interjuID">
      <Definition>i.[msk_kex_interjuID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_interjuID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idjelentkezo">
      <Definition>i.[idjelentkezo]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="datum">
      <Definition>i.[datum]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idbehivva">
      <Definition>i.[idbehivva]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="ideredmeny">
      <Definition>i.[ideredmeny]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="iddolgozik">
      <Definition>i.[iddolgozik]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idmegjelent">
      <Definition>i.[idmegjelent]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="megjegyzes">
      <Definition>i.[megjegyzes]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="megjegyzes_flag">
      <Definition>CASE WHEN i.[megjegyzes] IS NULL THEN 'Nincs' ELSE 'Van' END as megjegyzes_flag</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>i.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idmegjelent_interju_LookupValue">
      <Definition>lm.[LookupValue] as idmegjelent_interju_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="ideredmeny_interju_LookupValue">
      <Definition>le.[LookupValue] as ideredmeny_interju_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="neve">
      <Definition>j.[nev] as neve</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="csoportos">
      <Definition>1 as csoportos</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>csoportos</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>i.[idjelentkezo]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>csoportos</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

    WHERE g.Deleted=0

<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <!--<SqlSelect type="Select">FROM msk_kex_interju as i 
			  LEFT JOIN amsk_kex_LookupList as lm ON i.idmegjelent = lm.LookupListID 
			  LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as le ON i.ideredmeny = le.LookupListID

    WHERE g.Deleted=0 
    AND msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID NOT IN (SELECT MAX(msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID) FROM msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok)

        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>g.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="neve">
      <Definition>g.[nev] as neve</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXCsoportosMailLog.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect distinct="true" type="StoredProcedure">
    msk_defaultMultipleSelection @ID='csoportos', <!--csak a LOG beazonosítása miatt-->
    @SelectionString='
    FROM msk_MailSend_Log as m
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok as j on j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID = m.SentToJelentkezoID AND m.SentToJelentkezoTablaID=1
    WHERE m.Deleted=0 AND 1=1' ,
    @UserID=[##Session.UserID##] ,
  </SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="MailSendLogID">
      <Definition>m.[MailSendLogID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>MailSendLogID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Modul">
      <Definition>m.[Modul]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Recipients">
      <Definition>m.[Recipients]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="CopyRecipients">
      <Definition>m.[CopyRecipients]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="BlindCopyRecipients">
      <Definition>m.[BlindCopyRecipients]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Subject">
      <Definition>m.[Subject]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Body">
      <Definition>m.[Body]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="BodyFormat">
      <Definition>m.[BodyFormat]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Importance">
      <Definition>m.[Importance]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="FileAttachments">
      <Definition>m.[FileAttachments]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="MailItemID">
      <Definition>m.[MailItemID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Created">
      <Definition>m.[Created]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Success">
      <Definition>m.[Success]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="EmailTemplateID">
      <Definition>m.[EmailTemplateID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="EmailTemplateName">
      <Definition>(SELECT TOP 1 TemplateName FROM orn_szi_EmailTemplateSample WHERE EmailTemplateSampleID=EmailTemplateID) as EmailTemplateName</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="SentToJelentkezoID">
      <Definition>m.[SentToJelentkezoID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="SentToJelentkezoName">
      <Definition>(SELECT TOP 1 Nev FROM msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID=SentToJelentkezoID AND Deleted=0) as SentToJelentkezoName</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="CreatedBy">
      <Definition>m.[CreatedBy]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="CreatedByName">
      <Definition>(SELECT TOP 1 Name FROM People WHERE PeopleID=CreatedBy AND Deleted=0) as CreatedByName</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>m.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="SentToJelentkezoTablaID">
      <Definition>m.[SentToJelentkezoTablaID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>SentToJelentkezoTablaID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>j.[msk_kex_jelentkezokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXCsoportosMailLogGDPR.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect distinct="true" type="StoredProcedure">
    msk_defaultMultipleSelection @ID='csoportos', <!--csak a LOG beazonosítása miatt-->
    @SelectionString='
    FROM msk_MailSend_Log as m
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok as g on g.msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID = m.SentToJelentkezoID AND m.SentToJelentkezoTablaID=2
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok as j on j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID = m.SentToJelentkezoID
    WHERE m.Deleted=0'  ,
    @UserID=[##Session.UserID##] ,
  </SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="MailSendLogID">
      <Definition>m.[MailSendLogID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>MailSendLogID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Modul">
      <Definition>m.[Modul]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Recipients">
      <Definition>m.[Recipients]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="CopyRecipients">
      <Definition>m.[CopyRecipients]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="BlindCopyRecipients">
      <Definition>m.[BlindCopyRecipients]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Subject">
      <Definition>m.[Subject]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Body">
      <Definition>m.[Body]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="BodyFormat">
      <Definition>m.[BodyFormat]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Importance">
      <Definition>m.[Importance]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="FileAttachments">
      <Definition>m.[FileAttachments]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="MailItemID">
      <Definition>m.[MailItemID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Created">
      <Definition>m.[Created]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Success">
      <Definition>m.[Success]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="EmailTemplateID">
      <Definition>m.[EmailTemplateID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="EmailTemplateName">
      <Definition>(SELECT TOP 1 TemplateName FROM orn_szi_EmailTemplateSample WHERE EmailTemplateSampleID=EmailTemplateID) as EmailTemplateName</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="SentToJelentkezoID">
      <Definition>m.[SentToJelentkezoID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="SentToJelentkezoName">
      <Definition>(SELECT TOP 1 Nev FROM msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID=SentToJelentkezoID AND Deleted=0) as SentToJelentkezoName</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="CreatedBy">
      <Definition>m.[CreatedBy]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="CreatedByName">
      <Definition>(SELECT TOP 1 Name FROM People WHERE PeopleID=CreatedBy AND Deleted=0) as CreatedByName</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>m.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="SentToJelentkezoTablaID">
      <Definition>m.[SentToJelentkezoTablaID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>SentToJelentkezoTablaID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>m.[SentToJelentkezoID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXCsoportosOrvosi.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect type="StoredProcedure">
    msk_defaultMultipleSelection @ID='csoportosorvosi', <!--csak a LOG beazonosítása miatt-->
    @SelectionString='
    FROM msk_kex_orvosi as o
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_orvositipusok as ot ON o.idorvositipus = ot.msk_kex_orvositipusokID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as le ON o.idelkezdte = le.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as ler ON o.ideredmeny = ler.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok as j on j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID = o.idjelentkezo
    WHERE o.Deleted=0 AND 1=1' ,
    @UserID=[##Session.UserID##] ,
  </SqlSelect>
  <!--<SqlSelect>FROM msk_kex_orvosi as o 
			  LEFT JOIN msk_kex_orvositipusok as ot ON o.idorvositipus = ot.msk_kex_orvositipusokID 
			  LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as le ON o.idelkezdte = le.LookupListID 
			  LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as ler ON o.ideredmeny = ler.LookupListID 
			  WHERE o.Deleted=0 AND 1=1</SqlSelect>-->
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_orvosiID">
      <Definition>o.[msk_kex_orvosiID]</Definition>

    </Column>
    <Column name="datum">
      <Definition>o.[datum]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>

      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idelkezdte">
      <Definition>o.[idelkezdte]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>

      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>o.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="neve">
      <Definition>j.[nev] as neve</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="csoportos">
      <Definition>1 as csoportos</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>csoportos</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>o.[idjelentkezo]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>csoportos</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect type="StoredProcedure">
    msk_defaultMultipleSelection @ID='csoportosteszt', 
    @SelectionString='FROM msk_kex_teszt as t
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_teszttipusok as tt ON t.idteszttipus = tt.msk_kex_teszttipusokID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as lm ON t.idmegirta = lm.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as le ON t.ideredmeny = le.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok as j on j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID = t.idjelentkezo
    WHERE t.Deleted=0 AND 1=1 ' ,
    @UserID=[##Session.UserID##] ,
  </SqlSelect>
  <!--<SqlSelect>FROM msk_kex_teszt as t 
			  LEFT JOIN msk_kex_teszttipusok as tt ON t.idteszttipus = tt.msk_kex_teszttipusokID 
			  LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as lm ON t.idmegirta = lm.LookupListID 
			  LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as le ON t.ideredmeny = le.LookupListID 
			  WHERE t.Deleted=0 AND 1=1</SqlSelect>-->

    </Column>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXEmailAlairas.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect>FROM msk_kex_emailalairas e WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN People p WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.PeopleID=e.PeopleID WHERE e.Deleted=0 AND p.Deleted=0 AND 1=1</SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_emailalairasID">
      <Definition>e.[msk_kex_emailalairasID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_emailalairasID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_emailalairasID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="PeopleID">
      <Definition>e.[PeopleID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_emailalairasID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Name">
      <Definition>p.[Name]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_emailalairasID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Alairas">
      <Definition>e.[Alairas]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_emailalairasID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>e.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_emailalairasID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_emailalairasID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>e.[msk_kex_emailalairasID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXFelveteliStatusz.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect distinct="true">
    FROM msk_kex_felvstatusz f 
	LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_LookupList l ON f.Idfelvstatusz=l.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_elutasitasindokok e ON f.Idelutasitasindok=e.msk_kex_elutasitasindokokID
    LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_visszalepesindokok v ON f.Idvisszalepesindok=v.msk_kex_visszalepesindokokID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok j ON j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID=f.Idjelentkezo
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok g ON g.HashID=j.HashID
    WHERE f.Deleted=0 AND 1=1
  </SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="Msk_kex_felvstatuszID">
      <Definition>f.[Msk_kex_felvstatuszID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Idjelentkezo">
      <Definition>f.[Idjelentkezo]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Idfelvstatusz">
      <Definition>f.[Idfelvstatusz]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Felvstatusz">
      <Definition>l.[LookupValue] as Felvstatusz</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Datum">
      <Definition>f.[Datum]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Belepesdatum">
      <Definition>f.[Belepesdatum]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Idelutasitasindok">
      <Definition>f.[Idelutasitasindok]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Elutasitasindok">
      <Definition>e.[nev] as Elutasitasindok</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Idvisszalepesindok">
      <Definition>f.[Idvisszalepesindok]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Visszalepesindok">
      <Definition>v.[nev] as Visszalepesindok</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Statuszindoka">
      <Definition><![CDATA[
        (SELECT CASE
        WHEN ISNULL(e.[nev],'') <> '' THEN e.[nev]
        WHEN ISNULL(v.[nev],'') <> '' THEN v.[nev]
        else
        ''
        end) 
        as Statuszindoka
        ]]></Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>f.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>Msk_kex_felvstatuszID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idallasajanlat">
      <Definition>j.[idallasajanlat]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[idjelentkezo]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>g.[msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>j.[idallasajanlat]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>MAPErvenyes</Alias>
      <AsType>Param</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>	  
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXFilelink.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect>FROM msk_kex_jelentkezok t WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Deleted=0 AND 1=1  </SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_jelentkezokID">
      <Definition>[msk_kex_jelentkezokID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID2</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="cvlinkid">
      <Definition>[cvlinkid]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="FileInterfaceID">
      <Definition><![CDATA[CAST(cvlinkid  AS VARCHAR(20)) as FileInterfaceID]]></Definition>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>FileInterfaceID</Alias>
        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
      <UseFileInterface>true</UseFileInterface>
    </Column>
    <Column name="filelink">
      <Definition>(SELECT TOP 1 CodeValue FROM FSYS_ApplicationSetup WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE Code = 'DocBaseLink' ORDER BY ApplicationSetupID DESC) as filelink</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="MotivaciosDokID">
      <Definition>[MotivaciosDokID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="MotivaciosDokIDFileInterfaceID">
      <Definition><![CDATA[CAST(MotivaciosDokID  AS VARCHAR(20)) as MotivaciosDokIDFileInterfaceID]]></Definition>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>MotivaciosDokIDFileInterfaceID</Alias>
        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
      <UseFileInterface>true</UseFileInterface>
    </Column>
    <Column name="IsMotLev">
      <Definition><![CDATA[(CASE WHEN [MotivaciosDokID] IS NULL OR [MotivaciosDokID] = 0 THEN 'none' ELSE 'inline' END) as IsMotLev]]></Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[msk_kex_jelentkezokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>IsMotLevID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[msk_kex_jelentkezokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
</DataDefinition>
