===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXFIUvezeto.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect>
    FROM msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok as v
    LEFT JOIN  People AS p ON v.Idvezeto = p.PeopleID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as ls ON v.mjgy = ls.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as ll ON v.Statuszolovezeto+11 = ll.LookupListID
    WHERE v.Deleted=0 AND 1=1
  </SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetokID">
      <Definition>v.[msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetokID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetokID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Idvezeto">
      <Definition>v.[Idvezeto]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Idallasajanlat">
      <Definition>v.[Idallasajanlat]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Vezeto">
      <Definition>p.[Name] as Vezeto</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Mjgy">
      <Definition>v.[Mjgy]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="statusz_LookupValue">
      <Definition>ls.[LookupValue] as statusz_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Statuszolovezeto">
      <Definition>v.[Statuszolovezeto]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Statuszolovezeto_LookupValue">
      <Definition>ll.[LookupValue] as Statuszolovezeto_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>v.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>v.[Idallasajanlat]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXInterjuertekeles.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect distinct="true">
    FROM msk_kex_interju as i
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as lm ON i.idmegjelent = lm.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as le ON i.ideredmeny = le.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok j ON j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID=i.idjelentkezo
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok g ON g.HashID=j.HashID
    WHERE i.Deleted=0 AND 1=1
  </SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_interjuID">
      <Definition>i.[msk_kex_interjuID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_interjuID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idjelentkezo">
      <Definition>i.[idjelentkezo]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="datum">
      <Definition>i.[datum]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idbehivva">
      <Definition>i.[idbehivva]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="ideredmeny">
      <Definition>i.[ideredmeny]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="iddolgozik">
      <Definition>i.[iddolgozik]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idmegjelent">
      <Definition>i.[idmegjelent]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="megjegyzes">
      <Definition>i.[megjegyzes]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="megjegyzes_flag">
      <Definition>CASE WHEN i.[megjegyzes] IS NULL THEN 'Nincs' ELSE 'Van' END as megjegyzes_flag</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>i.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idmegjelent_interju_LookupValue">
      <Definition>lm.[LookupValue] as idmegjelent_interju_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="ideredmeny_interju_LookupValue">
      <Definition>le.[LookupValue] as ideredmeny_interju_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idallasajanlat">
      <Definition>j.[idallasajanlat]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>i.[idjelentkezo]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>g.[msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>j.[idallasajanlat]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

		WHERE j.Deleted=0 AND 1=1

      <Definition>j.[idvisszalepesindok]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="berigeny">
      <Definition>j.[berigeny]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idszin">
      <Definition>j.[idszin]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="szinnev">
      <Definition>s.nev as szinnev</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="szin_kodja">
      <Definition>s.[szin] as szin_kodja</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="betu_szine">
      <Definition><![CDATA[
        (select case when 
        (s.msk_kex_szinID = 5)
        then 'black' else 'white' end )
        as betu_szine
        ]]></Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>j.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="filelink">
      <Definition>'almafa' as filelink</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="csoportos">
      <Definition>1 as csoportos</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>csoportos</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="map_beerkezes">
      <Definition>j.[map_beerkezes]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="HashID">
      <Definition>j.[HashID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="MAPErvenyes">
      <Definition>j.[MAPErvenyes]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>MAPErvenyes</Alias>
        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[idallasajanlat]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
      <AsType>Param</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</Alias>
      <AsType>Param</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>cvlinkidFileInterfaceID</Alias>
      <AsType>Param</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>JelentkezesiDokIDFileInterfaceID</Alias>
      <AsType>Param</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>AdatkezelesiDokIDFileInterfaceID</Alias>
      <AsType>Param</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>MotivaciosDokIDFileInterfaceID</Alias>
      <AsType>Param</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>MunkavallaloiDokIDFileInterfaceID</Alias>
      <AsType>Param</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
	  <ForwardedFilter>
		  <Alias>Msk_tob_keresesikerelemID_ID</Alias>
		  <AsType>Param</AsType>
	  </ForwardedFilter>
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXJelentkezoKerAllas.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <!--   <SqlSelect>FROM msk_kex_jelentkezok WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Deleted=0 AND 1=1</SqlSelect> -->
  <!--<SqlSelect>
		FROM msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok as g
		WHERE g.Deleted=0 AND 1=1
  </SqlSelect>-->
  <SqlSelect type="StoredProcedure">
      msk_defaultMultipleSelection @ID='GDPR_Allas', <!--csak a LOG beazonosítása miatt-->
      @SelectionString='
      FROM msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok as g
      WHERE g.Deleted=0 AND 1=1' ,
      @UserID=[##Session.UserID##] ,
    </SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID">
      <Definition>g.[msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
      <!--<OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>-->
    </Column>
    <Column name="idallasajanlat">
      <Definition>g.[idallasajanlat]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="nev">
      <Definition>g.[nev]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="email">
      <Definition>g.[email]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="telefonszam">
      <Definition>g.[telefonszam]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>g.[msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect type="StoredProcedure">msk_kex_jelentkezok_ker_allasajanlatok '[##Session.UserID##]',</SqlSelect>
  <!--<SqlSelect distinct="true">
	  <![CDATA[
    FROM msk_kex_allasajanlatok as a
    LEFT JOIN People as p ON a.idtoborzo1 = p.PeopleID
    LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok j ON j.idallasajanlat=a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID
    LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok g ON g.HashID=j.HashID
    WHERE (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT g.msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID) FROM msk_kex_allasajanlatok as a
    LEFT JOIN People as p ON a.idtoborzo1 = p.PeopleID
    LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok j ON j.idallasajanlat=a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID
    LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok g ON g.HashID=j.HashID
    WHERE 1=1)=1 AND 1=1 and dateadd(year,CAST(ISNULL((SELECT TOP 1 CodeValue FROM dbo.FSYS_ApplicationSetup WHERE Code='GDPR_megorzesi_ido' AND Deleted=0),1) AS INT) ,j.datum)>getdate()   
	]]>
  </SqlSelect>-->

    msk_defaultMultipleSelection @ID='GDPR_Allas', -->

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXJelentkezokKeresese.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect distinct="true">
    FROM msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok as g
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok as j on g.HashID = j.HashID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_allasajanlatok as a on j.idallasajanlat = a.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_interju as i on j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID = i.idjelentkezo
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_teszt as t on j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID = t.idjelentkezo
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_teszttipusok as tt on t.idteszttipus = tt.msk_kex_teszttipusokID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_orvosi as o on j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID = o.idjelentkezo
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_orvositipusok as ot on o.idorvositipus = ot.msk_kex_orvositipusokID
    --LEFT JOIN msk_kex_felvstatusz as f ON f.Idjelentkezo = (SELECT MAX(f2.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID) FROM dbo.msk_kex_felvstatusz f2 WHERE Idjelentkezo=j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID AND f2.Deleted=0 GROUP BY f2.Idjelentkezo) --j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID
    WHERE g.Deleted=0 AND (g.Idanonindok is NULL or g.Idanonindok=0) AND CAST(g.gdpr_vege AS DATETIME) &gt;= GETDATE()
    AND 1=1
  </SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID">
      <Definition>g.[msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idallasajanlat">
      <Definition>g.[idallasajanlat]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
      <!--<OutFilter>
        <Alias>idallasajanlat_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>-->
    </Column>
    <Column name="iddrupal">
      <Definition>g.[iddrupal]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="targy">
      <Definition>g.[targy]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXJelentkezokKereseseMailLog.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect type="StoredProcedure">msk_kex_jemail</SqlSelect>
  <!--<SqlSelect distinct="true"> 
	  <![CDATA[
	  FROM msk_MailSend_Log m
	  LEFT JOIN msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok g ON g.msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID=m.SentToJelentkezoID
	  LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok j ON j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID=m.SentToJelentkezoID
	  WHERE m.Deleted=0
	  AND m.SentToJelentkezoTablaID=1
	  AND m.Modul = 'KEX'
	  and dateadd(year,CAST(ISNULL((SELECT TOP 1 CodeValue FROM dbo.FSYS_ApplicationSetup WHERE Code='GDPR_megorzesi_ido' AND Deleted=0),1) AS INT) ,j.datum)>getdate()
	  AND 1=1
	  ]]>
  </SqlSelect>-->
  <Columns>
    <Column name="MailSendLogID">
      <Definition>m.[MailSendLogID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>MailSendLogID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Modul">
      <Definition>m.[Modul]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Recipients">
      <Definition>m.[Recipients]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="CopyRecipients">
      <Definition>m.[CopyRecipients]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="BlindCopyRecipients">
      <Definition>m.[BlindCopyRecipients]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Subject">
      <Definition><![CDATA[
        (SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT CreatedBy FROM msk_MailSend_Log WHERE MailSendLogID = m.[MailSendLogID]) = '[##Session.UserID##]' THEN m.[Subject] ELSE '' END) as Subject]]></Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="SubjectNoLink">
      <Definition><![CDATA[(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT CreatedBy FROM msk_MailSend_Log WHERE MailSendLogID = m.[MailSendLogID]) <> '[##Session.UserID##]' THEN m.[Subject] ELSE '' END) as SubjectNoLink]]></Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Body">
      <Definition>m.[Body]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="BodyFormat">
      <Definition>m.[BodyFormat]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Importance">
      <Definition>m.[Importance]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="FileAttachments">
      <Definition>m.[FileAttachments]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="MailItemID">
      <Definition>m.[MailItemID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Created">
      <Definition>m.[Created]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Success">
      <Definition>m.[Success]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="EmailTemplateID">
      <Definition>m.[EmailTemplateID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="EmailTemplateName">
      <Definition>(SELECT TOP 1 TemplateName FROM orn_szi_EmailTemplateSample WHERE EmailTemplateSampleID=EmailTemplateID) as EmailTemplateName</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="SentToJelentkezoID">
      <Definition>m.[SentToJelentkezoID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="CreatedBy">
      <Definition>m.[CreatedBy]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="CreatedByName">
      <Definition>(SELECT TOP 1 Name FROM People WHERE PeopleID=CreatedBy AND Deleted=0) as CreatedByName</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="AllasNeve">
      <Definition><![CDATA[
          (SELECT CASE WHEN m.SentToJelentkezoTablaID = 2 THEN ''
                       WHEN m.SentToJelentkezoTablaID = 1 THEN (SELECT TOP 1 Targy FROM msk_kex_allasajanlatok a WHERE msk_kex_allasajanlatokID=j.idallasajanlat AND Deleted=0) END)
          as AllasNeve]]></Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>m.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="SentToJelentkezoTablaID">
      <Definition>m.[SentToJelentkezoTablaID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>SentToJelentkezoTablaID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <!--<InFilter>

    </InFilter>-->
    <!--<ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>-->
  </InFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXJelentkezokKivalasztasa.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect>
    distinct (j.NEV), msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID
    FROM msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok as j WITH(NOLOCK)
    where 1=1 
    ORDER BY j.NEV AND 1=1
  </SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID">
      <Definition>[msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="nev">
      <Definition>[nev]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXMailLog.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect distinct="true">
    FROM msk_MailSend_Log m LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok j ON j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID=m.SentToJelentkezoID
    WHERE m.Deleted=0
    AND m.SentToJelentkezoTablaID=1
    AND m.Modul = 'KEX'
    AND 1=1
  </SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="MailSendLogID">
      <Definition>m.[MailSendLogID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>MailSendLogID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Modul">
      <Definition>m.[Modul]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Recipients">
      <Definition>m.[Recipients]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="CopyRecipients">
      <Definition>m.[CopyRecipients]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="BlindCopyRecipients">
      <Definition>m.[BlindCopyRecipients]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Subject">
      <Definition>m.[Subject]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <!--<Column name="EmailMelleklet">
      <Definition>m.[EmailMelleklet]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>-->
    <Column name="Body">
      <Definition>m.[Body]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="BodyFormat">
      <Definition>m.[BodyFormat]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Importance">
      <Definition>m.[Importance]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="FileAttachments">
      <Definition>m.[FileAttachments]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="MailItemID">
      <Definition>m.[MailItemID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Created">
      <Definition>m.[Created]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Success">
      <Definition>m.[Success]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="EmailTemplateID">
      <Definition>m.[EmailTemplateID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="EmailTemplateName">
      <Definition>(SELECT TOP 1 TemplateName FROM orn_szi_EmailTemplateSample WHERE EmailTemplateSampleID=EmailTemplateID) as EmailTemplateName</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="SentToJelentkezoID">
      <Definition>m.[SentToJelentkezoID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="CreatedBy">
      <Definition>m.[CreatedBy]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="CreatedByName">
      <Definition>(SELECT TOP 1 Name FROM People WHERE PeopleID=CreatedBy AND Deleted=0) as CreatedByName</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>m.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="SentToJelentkezoTablaID">
      <Definition>m.[SentToJelentkezoTablaID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>MailSendLogID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>SentToJelentkezoTablaID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>j.[msk_kex_jelentkezokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
    <!--<InFilter>
      <Alias>EmailCC_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[CopyRecipients]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>-->
  </InFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXMJGY.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect>FROM People WHERE (PeopleID IN (SELECT PeopleID_mjgy FROM msk_mjgy)) AND dbo.msk_aktivPeopleID(PeopleID)='true' AND Deleted=0 AND 1=1</SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="PeopleID">
      <Definition>[PeopleID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>PeopleID</IdColumn>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect>FROM ( SELECT 1 AS id, 'Row 1' AS value ) AS x WHERE x.id=1 and 1=1</SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="id">
      <Definition>id</Definition>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>id</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
      <IdColumn>id</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="value">
      <Definition>value</Definition>
      <IdColumn>id</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>value</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXOrvosi.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect distinct="true">
		FROM msk_kex_orvosi as o
		LEFT JOIN msk_kex_orvositipusok as ot ON o.idorvositipus = ot.msk_kex_orvositipusokID
		LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as le ON o.idelkezdte = le.LookupListID
		LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as ler ON o.ideredmeny = ler.LookupListID
		LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok j ON j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID=o.idjelentkezo
		LEFT JOIN msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok g ON g.HashID=j.HashID
		WHERE o.Deleted=0 AND 1=1
	</SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_orvosiID">
      <Definition>o.[msk_kex_orvosiID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_orvosiID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idjelentkezo">
      <Definition>o.[idjelentkezo]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="datum">
      <Definition>o.[datum]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idorvositipus">
      <Definition>o.[idorvositipus]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idorvositipus_orvosi_LookupValue">
      <Definition>ot.[nev] as idorvositipus_orvosi_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idelkezdte">
      <Definition>o.[idelkezdte]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idelkezdte_orvosi_LookupValue">
      <Definition>le.[LookupValue] as idelkezdte_orvosi_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="ideredmeny">
      <Definition>o.[ideredmeny]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="ideredmeny_orvosi_LookupValue">
      <Definition>ler.[LookupValue] as ideredmeny_orvosi_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Deleted">
      <Definition>o.[Deleted]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idallasajanlat">
      <Definition>j.[idallasajanlat]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="igenylesdatuma">
      <Definition>o.[igenylesdatuma]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="kiallitasdatuma">
      <Definition>o.[kiallitasdatuma]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_orvosiID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>o.[idjelentkezo]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>g.[msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>j.[idallasajanlat]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXPozSelect.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
	<SqlSelect>
		FROM msk_tob_pozicio p
		left join msk_tob_LookupList l on l.LookuplistID = p.StatuszID and l.deleted=0
		WHERE 1=1 and StatuszID=32 and p.deleted=0
	</SqlSelect>
	<Columns>

		<Column name="PozicioID">
			<Definition>[PozicioID]</Definition>
			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
			<OutFilter>
				<Alias>PozicioID_ID</Alias>
				<Type>Out</Type>
			</OutFilter>
		</Column>

		<Column name="Idkeresesikerelem">
			<Definition>p.[Idkeresesikerelem]</Definition>
			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
			<OutFilter>
				<Alias>Msk_tob_keresesikerelemID_ID</Alias>
				<Type>Param</Type>
			</OutFilter>
		</Column>

		<Column name="Iktatoszam">
			<Definition>[Iktatoszam]</Definition>
			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
		</Column>

		<Column name="Engedelyezesidatum">
			<Definition>[Engedelyezesidatum]</Definition>
			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
		</Column>

		<Column name="StatuszID">
			<Definition>[StatuszID]</Definition>
			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
			<OutFilter>
				<Alias>StatuszID_ID</Alias>
				<Type>Param</Type>
			</OutFilter>
		</Column>

		<Column name="StatuszText">
			<Definition>[LookupValue] as StatuszText</Definition>
			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
		</Column>

		<Column name="Deleted">
			<Definition>p.[Deleted]</Definition>
			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
		</Column>		
		<Column name="PozicioInfo">
			<Definition>p.[PozicioInfo]</Definition>
			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
		</Column>
		
	</Columns>
	<InFilters>

			<Alias>Msk_tob_keresesikerelemID_ID</Alias>
			<ConnectedColumnDefinition>p.[Idkeresesikerelem]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
		</InFilter>
	</InFilters>
	<ForwardedFilters>
		<ForwardedFilter>
			<Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
			<AsType>Param</AsType>
		</ForwardedFilter>
	</ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
	<SqlSelect>
		FROM msk_tob_pozicio p
		left join msk_tob_LookupList l on l.LookuplistID = p.StatuszID and l.deleted=0
		WHERE 1=1
	</SqlSelect>
	<Columns>

		<Column name="PozicioID">
			<Definition>[PozicioID]</Definition>
			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
			<OutFilter>
				<Alias>PozicioID_ID</Alias>
				<Type>Out</Type>
			</OutFilter>
		</Column>

		<Column name="Idkeresesikerelem">
			<Definition>p.[Idkeresesikerelem]</Definition>
			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
			<OutFilter>
				<Alias>Msk_tob_keresesikerelemID_ID</Alias>
				<Type>Param</Type>
			</OutFilter>
		</Column>

			<Definition>[Iktatoszam]</Definition>
			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
		</Column>

		<Column name="Engedelyezesidatum">
			<Definition>[Engedelyezesidatum]</Definition>
			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
		</Column>

		<Column name="StatuszID">

			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
			<OutFilter>
				<Alias>StatuszID_ID</Alias>
				<Type>Param</Type>
			</OutFilter>
		</Column>

			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
		</Column>

		<Column name="Deleted">

			<IdColumn>PozicioID</IdColumn>
		</Column>

	</Columns>

		</ForwardedFilter>
	</ForwardedFilters>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXripJelentkezokforrasa.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <!--<SqlSelect distinct="true">
    FROM dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok AS J
    LEFT JOIN dbo.msk_kex_allasajanlatok AS A ON J.idallasajanlat = A.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID
    LEFT JOIN (SELECT
    fs.Idjelentkezo, fs.Idfelvstatusz, fs.Idelutasitasindok, fs.Idvisszalepesindok, fs.Deleted
    FROM
    dbo.msk_kex_felvstatusz fs
    INNER JOIN
    (
    SELECT Idjelentkezo, MAX(Msk_kex_felvstatuszID) maxfelstasztID
    FROM dbo.msk_kex_felvstatusz
    WHERE Idfelvstatusz IN (6,7,8) AND Deleted=0
    GROUP BY Idjelentkezo
    ) a7 ON a7.maxfelstasztID = fs.Msk_kex_felvstatuszID
    ) f ON f.Idjelentkezo = J.msk_kex_jelentkezokID
    WHERE 1=1
    GROUP BY (CASE WHEN f.Idfelvstatusz = 6 THEN 'Kiválasztott jelentkező' ELSE 'Jelentkező' END), J.honnanertesult
  </SqlSelect>-->
  <SqlSelect distinct="true" type="StoredProcedure">dbo.msk_kex_sel_jelentkezokforrasariport '[##Session.UserID##]',</SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <!--<Column name="msk_kex_allasajanlatokID">
      <Definition>[msk_kex_allasajanlatokID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>-->
    <Column name="jelentkezotipusa">
      <Definition>(CASE WHEN f.Idfelvstatusz = 6 THEN 'Kiválasztott jelentkező' ELSE 'Jelentkező' END) AS jelentkezotipusa</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>jelentkezotipusa_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="honnanertesult">
      <Definition>[honnanertesult]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <!--<Column name="datum_aktivalas">
      <Definition>[datum_aktivalas]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idtoborzo1">
      <Definition>[idtoborzo1]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idtoborzo2">
      <Definition>[idtoborzo2]</Definition>

    </Column>
    <Column name="idceg">
      <Definition>[idceg]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>-->
    <Column name="fo">
      <Definition>count (*) as fo</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>

      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>

      <IdColumn>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID</IdColumn>
    </Column>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXTeszt.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect distinct="true">
    FROM msk_kex_teszt as t
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_teszttipusok as tt ON t.idteszttipus = tt.msk_kex_teszttipusokID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as lm ON t.idmegirta = lm.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_LookupList as le ON t.ideredmeny = le.LookupListID
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_jelentkezok j ON j.msk_kex_jelentkezokID=t.idjelentkezo
    LEFT JOIN msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok g ON g.HashID=j.HashID
    WHERE t.Deleted=0 AND 1=1</SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_tesztID">
      <Definition>t.[msk_kex_tesztID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_tesztID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_tesztID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idjelentkezo">
      <Definition>t.[idjelentkezo]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_tesztID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="datum">
      <Definition>t.[datum]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_tesztID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idteszttipus">
      <Definition>t.[idteszttipus]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_tesztID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idteszttipus_teszt_LookupValue">
      <Definition>tt.[nev] as idteszttipus_teszt_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_tesztID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idbehivva">
      <Definition>t.[idbehivva]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_tesztID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idmegirta">
      <Definition>t.[idmegirta]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_tesztID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idmegirta_teszt_LookupValue">
      <Definition>lm.[LookupValue] as idmegirta_teszt_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_tesztID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="ideredmeny">
      <Definition>t.[ideredmeny]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_tesztID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="ideredmeny_teszt_LookupValue">
      <Definition>le.[LookupValue] as ideredmeny_teszt_LookupValue</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_tesztID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="megjegyzes">
      <Definition>t.[megjegyzes]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_tesztID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="megjegyzes_flag">
      <Definition>CASE WHEN t.[megjegyzes] IS NULL THEN 'Nincs' ELSE 'Van' END as megjegyzes_flag</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_tesztID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="teszt_Deleted">
      <Definition>t.[Deleted] as teszt_Deleted</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_tesztID</IdColumn>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idallasajanlat">
      <Definition>j.[idallasajanlat]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Param</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <InFilters>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>t.[idjelentkezo]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>g.[msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
    <InFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID</Alias>
      <ConnectedColumnDefinition>j.[idallasajanlat]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
    </InFilter>
  </InFilters>
  <ForwardedFilters>
    <ForwardedFilter>
      <Alias>msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID</Alias>
      <AsType>Out</AsType>
    </ForwardedFilter>
  </ForwardedFilters>
</DataDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DataDefinition\DataDefinitionMSKKEXTeszttipusok.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DataDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/datadefinition">
  <SqlSelect>FROM msk_kex_teszttipusok WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Deleted=0 AND 1=1</SqlSelect>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="msk_kex_teszttipusokID">
      <Definition>[msk_kex_teszttipusokID]</Definition>
      <IdColumn>msk_kex_teszttipusokID</IdColumn>
      <OutFilter>
        <Alias>msk_kex_teszttipusokID_ID</Alias>
        <Type>Out</Type>
      </OutFilter>
    </Column>

<DisplayDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/displaydefinition">
  <Caption>Állásajánlatok alap</Caption>

  </TableViewOptions>

    <IsOpenAllColumnsButtonVisible>true</IsOpenAllColumnsButtonVisible>
  </ToolbarOptions>
  <Columns>

    </Column>

      <Caption>BŐVEBB FELVILÁGOSÍTÁST AD</Caption>
    </Column>-->

      <Caption>BŐVEBB FELVILÁGOSÍTÁST AD</Caption>

    </Column>

    </Column>

      <Caption>Link a hirdetésre</Caption>
      <Width>300</Width>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idmunkaltato">
      <Caption>idmunkaltato</Caption>
      <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean">false</Visible>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idvezeto">
      <Caption>idvezeto</Caption>
      <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean">false</Visible>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idtoborzo1">
      <Caption>idtoborzo1</Caption>
      <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean">false</Visible>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idtoborzo2">
      <Caption>idtoborzo2</Caption>
      <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean">false</Visible>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idceg">
      <Caption>idceg</Caption>
      <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean">false</Visible>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <ControlPanel>
    <ManualSearchTriggering>true</ManualSearchTriggering>
    <Controls>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Idoszak</Name>
        <Type>DateRange</Type>
        <Caption>Álláshirdetés lejárat időszak:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition><![CDATA[
           ([datum_lejarat] BETWEEN '{0}' AND '{1} 23:59:59.999')
        ]]>        </ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>between</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKDateRange</ComboDefinition>
        <!--<DefaultValue type="SQL">SELECT CAST(DATEPART(YEAR,GETDATE()) AS VARCHAR) + '-01-01' + '|' + dbo.[MSK_Short_Date](GETDATE())</DefaultValue>-->
        <Width>270</Width>
      </Control>
      <!--
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Vallalat</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Vállalat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[uzletag]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
            -->
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Vallalat</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Vállalat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[idceg]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXCompanyAllas</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('ITadmin','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
        <!--<Readonly type="Constant" return="boolean" default="true">true</Readonly>-->
        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">
          Select distinct ISNULL(c.AllasVallalatKod,'12345') FROM People as p LEFT JOIN orn_SZI_Company as c ON c.VallalatKod = p.BUKRS LEFT JOIN msk_kex_allasajanlatok a ON a.idceg=c.AllasVallalatKod
          WHERE  p.PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]'
        </DefaultValue>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_szervezetiegyseg</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Szakterület:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[reszleg]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Munkavegzesihely</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkavégzési hely:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[munkavegzes_helye]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <!--
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Mjgy</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkáltatói jogkör gyakorló:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[idmunkaltato]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXMjgy</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
                  -->
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Mjgy</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkáltatói jogkör gyakorló:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[msk_kex_allasajanlatokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <!--<Operator>in</Operator>-->
        <Query>
          (SELECT Idallasajanlat FROM msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok WHERE Idvezeto = #param# AND Mjgy = 10) 
        </Query>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXMjgy</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_STvezeto</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Státuszoló vezető:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[idvezeto]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXStvezeto</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Toborzo</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Toborzó:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>1</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <!--csak azért hogy legyen saját query lehetőség-->
        <Query>
          (select 1) ) AND           <!--csak trükk, alább a lényeg--> ((idtoborzo1=#param#)           <!--or (idtoborzo2=#param#)--></Query>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXToborzo</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <DefaultValue type="Constant" return="int" default="">[##Session.UserID##]</DefaultValue>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('Toborzasi_folyamatgazda','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>alapexport</Name>
        <Type>ActionButton</Type>
        <Caption>Excel export</Caption>
        <OnButtonClick>
          <ActionType>Export</ActionType>
        </OnButtonClick>
      </Control>
    </Controls>
  </ControlPanel>
  <Links>
    <Link>
      <Type>OpenUrl</Type>
      <ColumnName>link</ColumnName>
      <Target>_blank</Target>
      <FilterInUrl>link</FilterInUrl>
    </Link>
  </Links>
</DisplayDefinition>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DisplayDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/displaydefinition">
  <DataDefinition>DataDefinitionMSKKEXNull</DataDefinition>
  <PageSize>100</PageSize>
  <AlternatePageSize>1000</AlternatePageSize>
  <OutFilterColumn>msk_kex_interjuID</OutFilterColumn>
  <IsToolbarVisible>false</IsToolbarVisible>
  <ViewType>Table</ViewType>
  <TableViewOptions>
    <!--<IsSimpleFilterEnabled>false</IsSimpleFilterEnabled>
    <IsEditToolVisible>false</IsEditToolVisible>-->
    <HeaderHeight>80</HeaderHeight>
  </TableViewOptions>
  <ControlPanel>
    <Controls>
      <Control>
        <Name>AllasajanlatLezaras</Name>
        <Type>ActionButton</Type>
        <Caption>Állásajánlat lezárása</Caption>
        <BusinessObject>BusinessObjectMSKKEXallasajanlatLezaras</BusinessObject>
        <ButtonLooksLike>DeleteObjectButton</ButtonLooksLike>
        <OnButtonClick>
          <ActionType>ProcessResultSet</ActionType>
          <RefreshAfterAction>Screen</RefreshAfterAction>
          <CloseScreenAfterAction>true</CloseScreenAfterAction>
          <StoredProcedure>msk_kex_allasajanlat_lezarasa</StoredProcedure>
        </OnButtonClick>
        <Question type="OkCancel">
          <Condition type="Constant" return="boolean" default="false">true</Condition>
          <Message type="Constant" return="string" default="">Biztosan le akarja zárni az állásajánlatot?</Message>
        </Question>
      </Control>
    </Controls>
  </ControlPanel>
  <Links>
  </Links>
</DisplayDefinition>

  <ControlPanel>
    <Controls>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Vallalat</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Vállalat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>a.[idceg]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXCompanyAllas</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('ITadmin','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
        <!--<Readonly type="Constant" return="boolean" default="true">true</Readonly>-->
        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">
          Select distinct ISNULL(c.AllasVallalatKod,'12345') FROM People as p LEFT JOIN orn_SZI_Company as c ON c.VallalatKod = p.BUKRS LEFT JOIN msk_kex_allasajanlatok a ON a.idceg=c.AllasVallalatKod
          WHERE  p.PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]'
        </DefaultValue>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Toborzo</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Érintett:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>1</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <!--csak azért hogy legyen saját query lehetoség-->
        <Query>
            (select 1) ) AND <!--csak trükk, alább a lényeg-->
          ((a.idtoborzo1=#param#) or (a.idtoborzo2=#param#) or (v.Idvezeto=#param#)
        </Query>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXPeople</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <DefaultValue type="Constant" return="int" default="">[##Session.UserID##]</DefaultValue>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('Toborzasi_folyamatgazda','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Munkavegzeshelye</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkavégzés helye:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>a.[munkavegzes_helye]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Poziciomegnevezese</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Pozíció megnevezése:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>a.[targy]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Tanfolyamos</Name>
        <Type>BoolSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Tanfolyamos pozíció?</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>CASE WHEN datum_tanfolyam_szoveges IS NULL OR datum_tanfolyam_szoveges='' THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Statusznelkul</Name>
        <Type>BoolSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Van státusz nélküli?</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>(case when j.idallasajanlat is null then 'False' else 'True' END)</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
      </Control>
    </Controls>
  </ControlPanel>
  <Links>
    <Link>
      <ColumnName>targy</ColumnName>
      <Screen>ScreenMSKKEXallasajanlatokEdit</Screen>
    </Link>
  </Links>
</DisplayDefinition>

      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Vallalat</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Vállalat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[idceg]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXCompanyAllas</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('ITadmin','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
        <!--<Readonly type="Constant" return="boolean" default="true">true</Readonly>-->
        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">
          Select distinct ISNULL(c.AllasVallalatKod,'12345') FROM People as p LEFT JOIN orn_SZI_Company as c ON c.VallalatKod = p.BUKRS LEFT JOIN msk_kex_allasajanlatok a ON a.idceg=c.AllasVallalatKod
          WHERE  p.PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]'
        </DefaultValue>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Toborzo</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Érintett:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>1</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <!--csak azért hogy legyen saját query lehetőség-->
        <Query>
        (select 1) ) AND <!--csak trükk, alább a lényeg-->
        ((a.idtoborzo1=#param#) or (a.idtoborzo2=#param#)
      </Query>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXPeople</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <DefaultValue type="Constant" return="int" default="">[##Session.UserID##]</DefaultValue>
        <!--      <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('Toborzasi_folyamatgazda','[##Session.UserID##]')</Readonly>-->
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Munkavegzeshelye</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkavégzés helye:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[munkavegzes_helye]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Poziciomegnevezese</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Pozíció megnevezése:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[targy]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Tanfolyamos</Name>
        <Type>BoolSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Tanfolyamos pozíció?</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>CASE WHEN datum_tanfolyam_szoveges IS NULL OR datum_tanfolyam_szoveges='' THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
      </Control>
      <!--    <Control>

        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>1</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <!--csak azért hogy legyen saját query lehetőség-->

          (select 1) ) DNA <!--csak trükk, alább a lényeg-->
          ((g.[HashID]=#param#) or (j.[HashID]=#param#)
        </Query>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">SELECT HashID FROM msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID='[##Filter.msk_kex_gdpr_jelentkezokID_ID##]'</DefaultValue>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DisplayDefinition\DisplayDefinitionMSKKEXDashboard.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DisplayDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/displaydefinition">
  <Caption>Riportok2</Caption>
  <DataDefinition>DataDefinitionMSKKEXDashboard</DataDefinition>
  <PageSize>100</PageSize>
  <AlternatePageSize>1000</AlternatePageSize>
  <ViewType>Card</ViewType>
  <HTMLTemplates>
    <HTMLTemplate width="0px" height="0px"><![CDATA[        
      <canvas name="placeholder2" id='chart[##CID##]' charttype="[##ChartID##]" data="[##Data##]" width="[##W##]" height="[##H##]" title="[##Title##]"></canvas>               
      <script language="JavaScript">  
          if (it==null){    
             var it=0;
          }
          if (it==0){              
                try{                                    
                  var script = document.createElement('script');
                  script.onload = function () {
                      var script2 = document.createElement('script');
                      script2.onload = function () { 
                                                                            //az osszes chart innen indithato egyszerre mert a betoltes async es nem lehet azonnal hivni 
                                                                            //a HTML betoltodese utan fut           
                        //test("placeholder2");
                        
                        startChart("placeholder2","mskchartpanelkex");                      //elemek neve ?s ?sszes elem sz?ma
                        it=0;                                               //mert norm?l esetben nem F5-el hanem ajaxos ?jrah?v?s is lehet
                      };
                      script2.src = "ui/js/"+Math.random()+"/../ChartMSK1_10.js?a="+Math.random();
                      document.head.appendChild(script2);
                    };//onload
                  script.src = "ui/js/Chart.js";
                  document.head.appendChild(script);                        
                }catch(e2){}                          
          }
          it++; 
      </script>

            ]]></HTMLTemplate>
  </HTMLTemplates>
  <OutFilterColumn>CID</OutFilterColumn>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="CID">
      <Caption>CID</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="ChartID">
      <Caption>ChartID</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Data">
      <Caption>Data</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="W">
      <Caption>W</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="H">
      <Caption>H</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Title">
      <Caption>Title</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="VallalatKod6789">
      <Caption>VallalatKod</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="szervezetiegyseg6789">
      <Caption>szervezetiegyseg</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="vezeto6789">
      <Caption>vezeto</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="datumtol6789">
      <Caption>datumtol</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="datumig6789">
      <Caption>datumig</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="mjgy6789">
      <Caption>mjgy</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="toborzo6789">
      <Caption>toborzo</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="hely6789">
      <Caption>hely</Caption>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <ControlPanel>
    <ManualSearchTriggering>true</ManualSearchTriggering>
    <Controls>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Vallalat</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Vállalat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[VallalatKod6789]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXCompanyAllas</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">
          Select distinct ISNULL(c.AllasVallalatKod,'12345') FROM People as p LEFT JOIN orn_SZI_Company as c ON c.VallalatKod = p.BUKRS LEFT JOIN msk_kex_allasajanlatok a ON a.idceg=c.AllasVallalatKod
          WHERE  p.PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]'
        </DefaultValue>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('ITadmin','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_datuminterval</Name>
        <Type>DateRange</Type>
        <Caption>Jelentkezés dátuma időszak:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition><![CDATA[
           2=2 AND ([datumtol6789] BETWEEN '{0}' AND '{1}')
        ]]></ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <!--<ConnectedColumnDefinition>
          <![CDATA[
           ([datumtol] BETWEEN '{0}' AND '{1} 23:59:59.999')
        ]]>
        </ConnectedColumnDefinition>-->
        <Operator>between</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKDateRange</ComboDefinition>
        <DefaultValue type="SQL">SELECT CAST(DATEPART(YEAR,GETDATE()) AS VARCHAR) + '-01-01' + '|' + dbo.[MSK_Short_Date](GETDATE())</DefaultValue>
        <!--dátum szűrő aktuális évre máig-->
        <Width>270</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_szervezetiegyseg</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Szakterület:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[szervezetiegyseg6789]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <!--<Operator>=</Operator>-->
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Munkavegzesihely</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkavégzési hely:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>hely6789</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <!--<Operator>%like%</Operator>-->
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Mjgy</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkáltatói jogkör gyakorló:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>mjgy6789</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <!--<Operator>in</Operator>-->
        <Query>
          (SELECT Idallasajanlat FROM msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok WHERE Idvezeto = #param# AND Mjgy = 10)
        </Query>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXMjgy</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_STvezeto</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Státuszoló vezető:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>vezeto6789</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXStvezeto</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Toborzo</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Toborzó:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>toborzo6789</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <!--csak azért hogy legyen saját query lehetőség-->
        <Query>
          (select 1) ) AND --&gt;<!--csak trükk, alább a lényeg-->
          ((idtoborzo1=#param#) or (idtoborzo2=#param#)
        </Query>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXToborzo</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <DefaultValue type="Constant" return="int" default="">[##Session.UserID##]</DefaultValue>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('Toborzasi_folyamatgazda','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
      </Control>
    </Controls>
  </ControlPanel>
</DisplayDefinition>

        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>a.[idceg]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXCompanyAllas</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('ITadmin','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
        <Visible type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">IF (SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('ITadmin','[##Session.UserID##]',0)) = 1 SELECT 0 ELSE SELECT 1</Visible>
        <!--<Readonly type="Constant" return="boolean" default="true">true</Readonly>-->
        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">
          Select distinct ISNULL(c.AllasVallalatKod,'12345') FROM People as p LEFT JOIN orn_SZI_Company as c ON c.VallalatKod = p.BUKRS LEFT JOIN msk_kex_allasajanlatok a ON a.idceg=c.AllasVallalatKod
          WHERE  p.PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]'
        </DefaultValue>
      </Control>

<DisplayDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/displaydefinition">
  <Caption>Kivalasztasi fázisok</Caption>
  <DataDefinition>DataDefinitionMSKKEXKivalasztasiFazisokRiport</DataDefinition>
  <OrderBy direction="Asc">jelentkezoNeve</OrderBy>
  <PageSize>100</PageSize>
  <AlternatePageSize>1000</AlternatePageSize>
  <OutFilterColumn>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</OutFilterColumn>
  <ViewType>Table</ViewType>

    <IsPinningEnabled>true</IsPinningEnabled>
  </TableViewOptions>

    <IsSelectionTypeTogglerVisible>false</IsSelectionTypeTogglerVisible>

  </ToolbarOptions>

      <Caption>TESZT EREDMÉNYE</Caption>
    </Column>

      <Caption>TESZT MEGJEGYZÉS</Caption>
    </Column>

    </Column>
    <Column name="orvosiTipusa">
      <Caption>ORVOSI TIPUSA</Caption>
    </Column>

      <Caption>ORVOSIT MEGKEZDTE</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="orvosinMegfelelt">
      <Caption>ORVOSIN MEGFELELT</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="kiallitasdatuma">
      <Caption>Orvosi kiállításának dátuma</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="vallalatFilter">
      <Caption>vallalatFilter</Caption>
      <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean">false</Visible>
    </Column>
    <Column name="allasajanlatFilter">
      <Caption>allasajanlatFilter</Caption>
      <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean">false</Visible>
    </Column>
    <Column name="mjgyFilter">
      <Caption>mjgyFilter</Caption>
      <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean">false</Visible>
    </Column>
    <Column name="statuszolovezetoFilter">
      <Caption>statuszolovezetoFilter</Caption>
      <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean">false</Visible>
    </Column>
    <Column name="toborzo1Filter">
      <Caption>toborzo1Filter</Caption>
      <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean">false</Visible>
    </Column>
    <Column name="toborzo2Filter">
      <Caption>toborzo2Filter</Caption>
      <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean">false</Visible>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <ControlPanel>
    <ManualSearchTriggering>true</ManualSearchTriggering>
    <Controls>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Idoszak</Name>
        <Type>DateRange</Type>
        <Caption>Jelentkezés dátuma időszak:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition><![CDATA[
           ([jel_datum] BETWEEN '{0}' AND '{1} 23:59:59.999')
        ]]>        </ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>between</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKDateRange</ComboDefinition>
        <DefaultValue type="SQL">SELECT CAST(DATEPART(YEAR,GETDATE()) AS VARCHAR) + '-01-01' + '|' + dbo.[MSK_Short_Date](GETDATE())</DefaultValue>
        <Width>270</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Vallalat</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Vállalat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[vallalatFilter]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXCompanyAllas</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('ITadmin','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">
            Select distinct ISNULL(c.AllasVallalatKod,'12345') FROM People as p LEFT JOIN orn_SZI_Company as c ON c.VallalatKod = p.BUKRS LEFT JOIN msk_kex_allasajanlatok a ON a.idceg=c.AllasVallalatKod
            WHERE  p.PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]'
        </DefaultValue>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Idallasajanlat</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Állásajánlat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[allasajanlatFilter]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Mjgy</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkáltatói jogkör gyakorló:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[mjgyFilter]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Query>
            (SELECT Idallasajanlat FROM msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok WHERE Idvezeto = #param# AND Mjgy = 10)
        </Query>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXMjgy</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_STvezeto</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Státuszoló vezető:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[statuszolovezetoFilter]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXStvezeto</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Toborzo</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Toborzó:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>1</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>in</Operator> --&gt;
                  <!--csak azért hogy legyen saját query lehetőség-->
        <Query>
            (select 1) ) AND           <!--csak trükk, alább a lényeg--> ((toborzo1Filter=#param#) or (toborzo2Filter=#param#)
        </Query>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXToborzo</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <DefaultValue type="Constant" return="int" default="">[##Session.UserID##]</DefaultValue>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('Toborzasi_folyamatgazda','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
      </Control>

        <Type>ActionButton</Type>
        <Caption>Excel export</Caption>
        <OnButtonClick>
          <ActionType>Export</ActionType>
        </OnButtonClick>
      </Control>
    </Controls>
  </ControlPanel>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DisplayDefinition\DisplayDefinitionMSKKEXMAPMunkavallalokFelveteliStatusz.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DisplayDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/displaydefinition">
  <Caption>Munkavállalók</Caption>
  <DataDefinition>DataDefinitionMSKKEXJeloltMunkavallalok</DataDefinition>
  <OrderBy direction="Asc">Nev</OrderBy>
  <PageSize>100</PageSize>
  <AlternatePageSize>1000</AlternatePageSize>
  <OutFilterColumn>PeopleID</OutFilterColumn>
  <ViewType>Table</ViewType>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="Name">
      <Caption>Név</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="PERNR">
      <Caption>Törzsszám</Caption>
      <Width>100</Width>
    </Column>
    <Column name="CompanyName">
      <Caption>Vállalat</Caption>
      <Width>250</Width>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Jobtitle">
      <Caption>Munkakör</Caption>
      <Width>250</Width>
    </Column>
    <Column name="ORGTX">
      <Caption>Szervezeti egység</Caption>
      <Width>250</Width>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <ControlPanel>
    <Controls>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Vallalat</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Vállalat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>p.[BUKRS]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXCompany</ComboDefinition>
        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="string" default="">SELECT TOP 1 BUKRS FROM dbo.People WHERE PeopleID='[##Session.UserID##]'</DefaultValue>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('ITadmin','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Nev</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Név:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>p.[Name]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Jobtitle</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkakör:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>p.[Jobtitle]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Szervezet</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Szervezeti egység:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>p.[ORGTX]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
    </Controls>
  </ControlPanel>
</DisplayDefinition>

<DisplayDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/displaydefinition">

  </TableViewOptions>

  </ToolbarOptions>

    </Column>

        <Type>DateRange</Type>
        <Caption>Jelentkezés dátuma időszak:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition><![CDATA[
           ([datum] BETWEEN '{0}' AND '{1} 23:59:59.999')
        ]]></ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>between</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKDateRange</ComboDefinition>
        <DefaultValue type="SQL">SELECT CAST(DATEPART(YEAR,GETDATE()) AS VARCHAR) + '-01-01' + '|' + dbo.[MSK_Short_Date](GETDATE())</DefaultValue>
        <!--dátum szűrő aktuális évre máig-->
        <Width>270</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Vallalat</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Vállalat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[idceg]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXCompanyAllas</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('ITadmin','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
        <!--<Readonly type="Constant" return="boolean" default="true">true</Readonly>-->
        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">
          Select distinct ISNULL(c.AllasVallalatKod,'12345') FROM People as p LEFT JOIN orn_SZI_Company as c ON c.VallalatKod = p.BUKRS LEFT JOIN msk_kex_allasajanlatok a ON a.idceg=c.AllasVallalatKod
          WHERE  p.PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]'
        </DefaultValue>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_szervezetiegyseg</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Szakterület:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[reszleg]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Munkavegzesihely</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkavégzési hely:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[munkavegzes_helye]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Mjgy</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkáltatói jogkör gyakorló:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[idallasajanlat]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <Query>
          (SELECT Idallasajanlat FROM msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok WHERE Idvezeto = #param# AND Mjgy = 10)
        </Query>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXMjgy</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_STvezeto</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>

        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[idvezeto]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXStvezeto</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Toborzo</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Toborzó:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>1</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <!--csak azért hogy legyen saját query lehetőség-->
        <Query>
          (select 1) ) AND <!--csak trükk, alább a lényeg-->
          ((idtoborzo1=#param#) <!-- or (idtoborzo2=#param#) --></Query>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXToborzo</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <DefaultValue type="Constant" return="int" default="">[##Session.UserID##]</DefaultValue>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('Toborzasi_folyamatgazda','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>export</Name>
        <Type>ActionButton</Type>
        <Caption>Excel export</Caption>
        <OnButtonClick>
          <ActionType>Export</ActionType>
        </OnButtonClick>
      </Control>
    </Controls>
  </ControlPanel>
