        <Caption>idallasajanlat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[idallasajanlat]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <DefaultValue type="Constant" return="int" default="">[##Filter.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID##]</DefaultValue>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <Visible>false</Visible>
      </Control>
    </Controls>
  </ControlPanel>
</DisplayDefinition>

===== FILE: C:\hop2\src\Hrportal-Root\XML\DisplayDefinition\DisplayDefinitionMSKKEXMunkavallalokVezeto.xml =====

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<DisplayDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/displaydefinition">
  <Caption>Vezető</Caption>
  <DataDefinition>DataDefinitionMSKKEXMJGY_Munkavallaloi</DataDefinition>
  <OrderBy direction="Asc">Name</OrderBy>
  <PageSize>100</PageSize>
  <AlternatePageSize>1000</AlternatePageSize>
  <OutFilterColumn>PeopleID</OutFilterColumn>
  <ViewType>Table</ViewType>
  <Columns>
    <Column name="PeopleID">
      <Caption>PeopleID</Caption>
      <Visible>false</Visible>
    </Column>
    <Column name="Name">
      <Caption>Név</Caption>
      <Width>250</Width>
    </Column>
    <Column name="PERNR">
      <Caption>Törzsszám</Caption>
      <Width>100</Width>
    </Column>
    <Column name="STLTX">
      <Caption>Munkakör</Caption>
      <Width>400</Width>
    </Column>
    <Column name="PSTLZ">
      <Caption>MunkaltatoTSZ</Caption>
      <Width>400</Width>
      <Visible>false</Visible>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <ControlPanel>
    <Controls>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Name</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Név:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[Name]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Jobtitle</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkakör:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[STLTX]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
      </Control>
      <!--Mjgy alá tartozó dolgozók-->
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_mjgy</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>mjgy:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[PSTLZ]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <DefaultValue type="Constant" return="int" default="">[##Filter.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID##]</DefaultValue>
        <Query>
          (
          SELECT P.PERNR
          FROM [dbo].[msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok] AS V
          LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM People WHERE Deleted = 0) as P ON V.Idvezeto = P.PeopleID
          WHERE V.idallasajanlat = #param# AND V.Mjgy = 10 AND V.Deleted= 0
          )
        </Query>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <Visible>false</Visible>
      </Control>
      <!--Kivéve a már kiválasztott dolgozók-->
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_vanmar</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Van már:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition> NOT [PeopleID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <DefaultValue type="Constant" return="int" default="">[##Filter.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID##]</DefaultValue>
        <Query>
          (
          SELECT V.IDvezeto
          FROM [dbo].[msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok] AS V
          WHERE V.idallasajanlat = #param# AND V.Mjgy = 9 AND V.Deleted= 0
          )
        </Query>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <Visible>false</Visible>
      </Control>
      <!--TODO:Befejezni a vezetői szerepkör figyelembevételével-->
      <!--
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Munkaltato</Name>  
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkáltató:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[PSTLZ]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">SELECT PERNR FROM People WHERE PeopleID = [##Filter.idmunkaltato_ID##]</DefaultValue>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean">false</Visible>
      </Control>
      -->
    </Controls>
  </ControlPanel>
</DisplayDefinition>

      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Idoszak</Name>
        <Type>DateRange</Type>
        <Caption>Jelentkezés dátuma időszak:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition><![CDATA[
           2=2 AND (j.datum BETWEEN '{0}' AND '{1} 23:59:59.999')
        ]]>        </ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>between</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKDateRange</ComboDefinition>
        <DefaultValue type="SQL">SELECT CAST(DATEPART(YEAR,GETDATE()) AS VARCHAR) + '-01-01' + '|' + dbo.[MSK_Short_Date](GETDATE())</DefaultValue>
        <Width>270</Width>
      </Control>

        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
            -->
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Vallalat</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Vállalat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[idceg]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXCompanyAllas</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('ITadmin','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
        <!--<Readonly type="Constant" return="boolean" default="true">true</Readonly>-->
        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">
          Select distinct ISNULL(c.AllasVallalatKod,'12345') FROM People as p LEFT JOIN orn_SZI_Company as c ON c.VallalatKod = p.BUKRS LEFT JOIN msk_kex_allasajanlatok a ON a.idceg=c.AllasVallalatKod
          WHERE  p.PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]'
        </DefaultValue>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_szervezetiegyseg</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Szakterület:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>zz.Szakterulet</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Munkavegzesihely</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkavégzési hely:</Caption>

        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Mjgy</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkáltatói jogkör gyakorló:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[msk_kex_allasajanlatokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <Query>
          (SELECT Idallasajanlat FROM msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok WHERE Idvezeto = #param# AND Mjgy = 10)
        </Query>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXMjgy</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>

        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Toborzó:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>1</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <!--csak azért hogy legyen saját query lehetőség-->
        <Query>
          (select 1) ) AND           <!--csak trükk, alább a lényeg--> ((idtoborzo1=#param#)           <!--or (idtoborzo2=#param#)--></Query>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXToborzo</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <DefaultValue type="Constant" return="int" default="">[##Session.UserID##]</DefaultValue>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('Toborzasi_folyamatgazda','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
      </Control>

        <Name>export</Name>
        <Type>ActionButton</Type>
        <Caption>Excel export</Caption>
        <OnButtonClick>
          <ActionType>Export</ActionType>
        </OnButtonClick>
      </Control>
    </Controls>
  </ControlPanel>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<DisplayDefinition xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/displaydefinition">
  <Caption>Pozíciók</Caption>
  <DataDefinition>DataDefinitionMSKKEXPozSelect</DataDefinition>
  <OrderBy direction="Asc">Iktatoszam</OrderBy>
  <PageSize>100</PageSize>
  <AlternatePageSize>1000</AlternatePageSize>
  <OutFilterColumn>PozicioID</OutFilterColumn>
  <ViewType>Table</ViewType>
	<Columns>

		<Column name="PozicioID">
			<Visible>false</Visible>
		</Column>

		<Column name="Idkeresesikerelem">
			<Visible>false</Visible>
		</Column>

		<Column name="Iktatoszam">
			<Caption>Munkaerőigény iktatószáma</Caption>
			<Visible>true</Visible>
		</Column>

		<Column name="Engedelyezesidatum">
			<Caption>Munkaerőigény engedélyezésének dátuma</Caption>
			<Visible>true</Visible>
		</Column>

		<Column name="StatuszText">
			<Caption>Pozíció státusza</Caption>
			<Visible>true</Visible>
		</Column>

		<Column name="PozicioInfo">
			<Caption>Megjegyzés</Caption>
			<Visible>true</Visible>
		</Column>

		

	</Columns>
	<ToolbarOptions>
		<IsSelectionTypeTogglerVisible>False</IsSelectionTypeTogglerVisible>
	</ToolbarOptions>
	<ControlPanel>
		<Controls>
		<Control>
          <Name>Filter_ID</Name>
          <Type>TextSearch</Type>
          <Caption>ID</Caption>
          <ConnectedColumnDefinition>p.idkeresesikerelem</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
          <Operator>=</Operator>
          <DefaultValue type="Constant" return="int" default="">'[##Filter.Msk_tob_keresesikerelemID_ID##]'</DefaultValue>
          <Visible>false</Visible>
      </Control>
			<!--IDFILTER-->
		
		<Control>
          <Name>Filter_ID2</Name>
          <Type>TextSearch</Type>
          <Caption>ID2</Caption>
          <ConnectedColumnDefinition>0</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
          <Operator>=</Operator>
          <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">
				  <![CDATA[
			  SELECT count(*) FROM [msk_kex_ajanlat] WHERE idjelentkezo='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]' AND deleted=0 AND isnull(idelfogadva,4)<>5 AND PozicioID IS not null
		  ]]>
			  </DefaultValue>
          <Visible>false</Visible>
      </Control>
		<!--IDFILTER2-->
		</Controls>		
		
	</ControlPanel>
  
</DisplayDefinition>

      <Caption>Belépés dátuma</Caption>
    </Column>
    <Column name="JelentkezoNeve">
      <Caption>Jelentkező neve</Caption>
    </Column>
  </Columns>

  <ControlPanel>
    <ManualSearchTriggering>true</ManualSearchTriggering>
    <Controls>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Vallalat</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Vállalat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>idceg</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXCompanyAllas</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('ITadmin','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">
          Select distinct ISNULL(c.AllasVallalatKod,'12345') FROM People as p 
          LEFT JOIN orn_SZI_Company as c ON c.VallalatKod = p.BUKRS 
          LEFT JOIN msk_kex_allasajanlatok a ON a.idceg=c.AllasVallalatKod
          WHERE  p.PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]'
        </DefaultValue>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_AjanlattetelDatuma</Name>
        <Type>DateRange</Type>
        <Caption>Ajánlattétel dátuma:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>
          <![CDATA[(AjanlattetelDatuma BETWEEN '{0}' AND '{1} 23:59:59.999')]]>
        </ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>between</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKDateRange</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>270</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Idallasajanlat</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Állásajánlat neve:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>PozicioNeve</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>PozicioStatuszaa</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Pozíció státusza:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>PozicioStatusza</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXPoziciokStatusza</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_FelveteliStatusz_a</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Felvételi státusz:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>FelveteliStatusz</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXFelveteliStatusz</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Mjgy_a</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkáltatói jogkörgyakorló:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>PeopleID</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXOrvosiStatuszoloVezeto</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>

      <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean">false</Visible>
    </Column>
    <Column name="idceg">
      <Caption>idceg</Caption>
      <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean">false</Visible>
    </Column>-->
    <Column name="fo">
      <Caption>FŐ</Caption>
    </Column>
  </Columns>
  <ControlPanel>
    <ManualSearchTriggering>true</ManualSearchTriggering>
    <Controls>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Idoszak</Name>
        <Type>DateRange</Type>
        <Caption>Jelentkezés dátuma időszak:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition><![CDATA[
           (J.datum BETWEEN '{0}' AND '{1} 23:59:59.999')
        ]]></ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>between</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKDateRange</ComboDefinition>
        <DefaultValue type="SQL">SELECT CAST(DATEPART(YEAR,GETDATE()) AS VARCHAR) + '-01-01' + '|' + dbo.[MSK_Short_Date](GETDATE())</DefaultValue>
        <Width>270</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Vallalat</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Vállalat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[idceg]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXCompanyAllas</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('ITadmin','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
        <!--<Readonly type="Constant" return="boolean" default="true">true</Readonly>-->
        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">
          Select distinct ISNULL(c.AllasVallalatKod,'12345') FROM People as p LEFT JOIN orn_SZI_Company as c ON c.VallalatKod = p.BUKRS LEFT JOIN msk_kex_allasajanlatok a ON a.idceg=c.AllasVallalatKod
          WHERE  p.PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]'
        </DefaultValue>
      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Idallasajanlat</Name>
        <Type>TextSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Állásajánlat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>a.[targy]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>%like%</Operator>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      <!--

        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>
      -->
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Mjgy</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Munkáltatói jogkör gyakorló:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>[msk_kex_allasajanlatokID]</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <!--<Operator>in</Operator>-->
        <Query>
          (SELECT Idallasajanlat FROM msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok WHERE Idvezeto = #param# AND Mjgy = 10)
        </Query>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXMjgy</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>200</Width>
      </Control>

        <Caption>Toborzó:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>1</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>in</Operator>
        <!--csak azért hogy legyen saját query lehetőség-->
        <Query>
          (select 1) ) AND <!--csak trükk, alább a lényeg-->
          ((idtoborzo1=#param#) <!--or (idtoborzo2=#param#)--></Query>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXToborzo</ComboDefinition>

        </OnButtonClick>

    </Column>
  </Columns>

  <ControlPanel>
    <ManualSearchTriggering>true</ManualSearchTriggering>
    <Controls>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_Vallalat</Name>
        <Type>ComboSearch</Type>
        <Caption>Vállalat:</Caption>
        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>idceg</ConnectedColumnDefinition>

        <Width>200</Width>
        <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('ITadmin','[##Session.UserID##]',0)</Readonly>
        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">
          Select distinct ISNULL(c.AllasVallalatKod,'12345') FROM People as p 
          LEFT JOIN orn_SZI_Company as c ON c.VallalatKod = p.BUKRS 
          LEFT JOIN msk_kex_allasajanlatok a ON a.idceg=c.AllasVallalatKod
          WHERE  p.PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]'
        </DefaultValue>
      </Control>

        <ConnectedColumnDefinition>PeopleID</ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>=</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXOrvosiStatuszoloVezeto</ComboDefinition>

      </Control>

      </Control>
      <Control>
        <Name>Filter_OrvosiKiallitasDatuma</Name>
        <Type>DateRange</Type>

        </ConnectedColumnDefinition>
        <Operator>between</Operator>
        <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKDateRange</ComboDefinition>
        <Width>270</Width>
      </Control>
      <Control>

        <DefaultValue type="SQL" return="int" default="">
          Select distinct ISNULL(c.AllasVallalatKod,'12345') FROM People as p 
          LEFT JOIN orn_SZI_Company as c ON c.VallalatKod = p.BUKRS 
          LEFT JOIN msk_kex_allasajanlatok a ON a.idceg=c.AllasVallalatKod
          WHERE  p.PeopleID = '[##Session.UserID##]'
        </DefaultValue>
      </Control>

                    --    select 'true'

          <Width>200</Width>

          <Mask>9999/99</Mask>
          <ValidateRule type="SQL" return="string">SELECT CASE WHEN (CAST(SUBSTRING('[##Field.datum_tanfolyam_szoveges##]', 1, 4) AS INT) &gt;= YEAR(GETDATE()) AND CAST(SUBSTRING('[##Field.datum_tanfolyam_szoveges##]', 5, 2) AS INT) &gt; 0 AND CAST(SUBSTRING('[##Field.datum_tanfolyam_szoveges##]', 5, 2) AS INT) &lt; 13 ) OR ('[##Field.datum_tanfolyam_szoveges##]' IS NULL OR '[##Field.datum_tanfolyam_szoveges##]' = '') THEN '' ELSE 'A tanfolyam ideje múltbeli, nem létező vagy nem megfelelő formátumú (éééé/hh)!' END</ValidateRule>
          <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default="">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('Toborzo','[##Session.UserID##]','[##Field.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID##]')</Readonly>

            <Message type="Constant" return="string" default="">Biztos anonimizálni akarja a jelentkezőt? Az anonimizálás nem visszavonható!</Message>
          </Question>
          <!--<Visible type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_menu_lathatosag] ('Toborzo','[##Session.UserID##]')</Visible>-->
        </Control>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<Form xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/editform">
  <Caption>Jelentkezők - új jelentkező</Caption>
  <DataDefinition>DataDefinitionMSKKEXCsoportos</DataDefinition>
  <BusinessObject>BusinessObjectMSKKEXCsoportos</BusinessObject>
  <ControlGroups>
    <ControlGroup name="msk_kex_jelentkezokID">
      <Controls>
        <Control>
          <Type>Label</Type>
          <Name>Label_msk_kex_jelentkezokID</Name>
          <Caption>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</Caption>
          <Width>150</Width>
          <Left>10</Left>
        </Control>
        <Control>
          <Type>TextBox</Type>
          <Name>TextBox_msk_kex_jelentkezokID</Name>
          <Width>200</Width>
          <Left>160</Left>
          <BindingName>msk_kex_jelentkezokID</BindingName>
        </Control>
      </Controls>
      <Rules>
        <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean" default="false">false</Visible>
      </Rules>
    </ControlGroup>
    <ControlGroup name="jelentkezolista">
      <Controls>
        <Control>
          <Type>Label</Type>
          <Name>Label_jelentkezolista</Name>
          <Caption>Jelentkezők listája</Caption>
          <Width>150</Width>
          <Left>10</Left>
        </Control>
        <Control>
          <Type>TextBox</Type>

            SELECT TOP 1 email = STUFF((SELECT N'; ' + p2.email
            FROM dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok AS p2
            WHERE p2.email = p.email AND msk_kex_jelentkezokID IN ([##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##])
            ORDER BY p2.email
            FOR XML PATH(N'')), 1, 2, N'')

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<Form xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/editform">
  <Caption>Orvosi</Caption>

  <ControlGroups>
    <ControlGroup name="MailTemplate">
      <Controls>
        <Control>
          <Type>Label</Type>
          <Name>Label_MailTemplate</Name>
          <Caption>Email sablon:</Caption>
          <Width>150</Width>
          <Left>10</Left>
        </Control>
        <Control>
          <Type>ComboBox</Type>
          <Name>ComboBox_MailTemplate</Name>
          <BindingName>EmailTemplateID</BindingName>
          <ComboDefinition>ComboMSKKEXMailTemplate</ComboDefinition>
          <ReComputing>TriggerOnRefresh</ReComputing>
        </Control>
      </Controls>
      <Rules>
        <Required type="Constant" return="boolean" default="true">true</Required>
      </Rules>
    </ControlGroup>
    <ControlGroup name="InnerComponent_CsoportosFuljelentkezok">
      <Controls>

            FROM dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok AS p2
            WHERE p2.email = p.email AND msk_kex_jelentkezokID IN ([##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##])

            IF  (('[##Field.Datum##]' = '' OR '[##Field.Idfelvstatusz##]' = '0' OR '[##Field.Idfelvstatusz##]' = '')
                OR ('[##Field.Idfelvstatusz##]' = '6' AND '[##Field.Belepesdatum##]' = '')
                OR ('[##Field.Idfelvstatusz##]' = '7' AND ('[##Field.Idelutasitasindok##]' = '0' OR '[##Field.Idelutasitasindok##]' = ''))
                OR ('[##Field.Idfelvstatusz##]' = '8' AND ('[##Field.Idvisszalepesindok##]' = '0' OR '[##Field.Idvisszalepesindok##]' = '')))
            SELECT 'true' ELSE SELECT 'false'
            ]]></Readonly>

						</Message>
          </Question>
        </Control>

          <Type>SaveButton</Type>
          <Name>Save</Name>
          <Caption>[#EditFormPanel.SaveButton#]</Caption>
          <Visible type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">
			  if (select count(*) from msk_kex_ajanlat where idjelentkezo='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]' and idelfogadva in (4,5) and deleted=0)>0
			  or (select count(*) from msk_kex_ajanlat where idjelentkezo='[##Filter.msk_kex_jelentkezokID_ID##]' and deleted=0)=0
			  begin
			  SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_menu_lathatosag] ('Toborzo','[##Session.UserID##]','[##Filter.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID##]')) = 'true' AND '[##Filter.csoportos##]' = '' AND '[##Filter.JumpType##]' = 'New' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END

            <CloseScreenAfterAction>true</CloseScreenAfterAction>
            <StoredProcedure>msk_kex_spcsoportosinterju</StoredProcedure>
          </OnButtonClick>
          <Question type="OkCancel">
            <Condition type="Constant" return="boolean" default="false">true</Condition>
            <Message type="Constant" return="string" default="">
              Biztosan mehet a csoportos kiosztás?
            </Message>
          </Question>
        </Control>
        <Control>
          <Type>SaveButton</Type>
          <Name>Save</Name>
          <Caption>[#EditFormPanel.SaveButton#]</Caption>
          <Width>80</Width>
          <Left>180</Left>
          <!--<Visible type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">'[##Filter.csoportos##]'==''</Visible>-->
          <Visible type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_menu_lathatosag] ('Toborzo','[##Session.UserID##]','[##Filter.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID##]')) = 'true' AND '[##Filter.csoportos##]' = '' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END</Visible>
        </Control>
        <Control>
          <Type>CancelButton</Type>

          <Width>50</Width>
          <Left>310</Left>
        </Control>

          <Type>DeleteButton</Type>

          <Width>50</Width>
          <Left>310</Left>

        </Control>
      </Controls>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<Form xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/form">
  <Caption>Jelentkezők - módosítás</Caption>
  <DataDefinition>DataDefinitionMSKKEXJelentkezok</DataDefinition>
  <BusinessObject>BusinessObjectMSKKEXJelentkezok</BusinessObject>
  <ControlGroups>
    <ControlGroup name="MAP_rights">
      <Controls>
        <Control>
          <Type>TextBox</Type>
          <Name>TextBox_MAP_rightsVisible</Name>
          <BindingName>MAP_rightsVisible</BindingName>
          <ComputedValue type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false"><![CDATA[
							/*rights*/
							IF (SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_menu_lathatosag] ('Vezeto','[##Session.UserID##]','[##Filter.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID##]')) = 'true'
							AND '[##Field.ajanlo_nev##]' != ''
							SELECT 'true'
						]]></ComputedValue>
          <Recomputing>Always</Recomputing>
        </Control>
      </Controls>
      <Rules>
        <Visible type="Constant" return="boolean" default="false">false</Visible>
      </Rules>
    </ControlGroup>
    <ControlGroup name="msk_kex_jelentkezokID">
      <Controls>
        <Control>
          <Type>Label</Type>
          <Name>Label_msk_kex_jelentkezokID</Name>

          <Type>InnerComponent</Type>
          <Name>InnerComponentFelveteiStatusz</Name>
          <Component>ComponentMSKKEXFelveteliStatusz</Component>
        </Control>
      </Controls>
      <Rules>
        <Visible type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_menu_lathatosag] ('Vezeto','[##Session.UserID##]','[##Filter.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID##]')</Visible>
      </Rules>
    </ControlGroup>
    <ControlGroup name="InnerComponent_JelentkezoFulFilelink">
      <Controls>
        <Control>
          <Type>InnerComponent</Type>
          <Name>InnerComponentJelentkezoFulFilelink</Name>
          <Component>ComponentMSKKEXJelentkezoFulFilelink</Component>
        </Control>
      </Controls>
      <Rules>
        <Visible type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_elem_readonly] ('Toborzo','[##Session.UserID##]','[##Filter.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID##]')</Visible>
      </Rules>
    </ControlGroup>
    <ControlGroup name="ButtonGroup">
      <Controls>
        <Control>
          <Type>SaveButton</Type>
          <Name>Save</Name>
          <Caption>[#EditFormPanel.SaveButton#]</Caption>
          <Question type="OkCancel">
            <Condition type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false"><![CDATA[
									IF '[##Field.ajanlo_nev##]' <> (SELECT ajanlo_nev FROM dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Field.msk_kex_jelentkezokID##]') OR
										'[##Field.MAPEmail##]' <> (SELECT MAPEmail FROM dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Field.msk_kex_jelentkezokID##]') OR	
										'[##Field.MAPCompany##]' <> (SELECT MAPCompany FROM dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Field.msk_kex_jelentkezokID##]')
									SELECT 'true']]></Condition>
            <Message type="SQL" return="string" default=""><![CDATA[
									DECLARE @Text Varchar(MAX) = '',
											@ajanlo_nev VARCHAR(255) = (SELECT TOP 1 ajanlo_nev FROM dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Field.msk_kex_jelentkezokID##]'),
											@MAPEmail VARCHAR(255) = (SELECT TOP 1 MAPEmail FROM dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Field.msk_kex_jelentkezokID##]'),
											@MAPCompany VARCHAR(255) = (SELECT TOP 1 c.Name FROM dbo.msk_kex_jelentkezok j INNER JOIN dbo.orn_SZI_Company c ON j.MAPCompany=c.VallalatKod WHERE msk_kex_jelentkezokID='[##Field.msk_kex_jelentkezokID##]'),
											@MAPCompanyUJ VARCHAR(255) = (SELECT Name FROM dbo.orn_SZI_Company WHERE VallalatKod='[##Field.MAPCompany##]')
									IF '[##Field.ajanlo_nev##]' <> @ajanlo_nev
										SET @Text = CONCAT(@Text,'Ajánló neve megváltozott, Eredeti: ', @ajanlo_nev,' Új: ','[##Field.ajanlo_nev##]','<br>')
									IF '[##Field.MAPEmail##]' <> @MAPEmail
										SET @Text = CONCAT(@Text,'Ajánló e-mail címe megváltozott, Eredeti: ', @MAPEmail,' Új: ','[##Field.MAPEmail##]','<br>')
									IF @MAPCompanyUJ <> @MAPCompany
										SET @Text = CONCAT(@Text,'Ajánló vállalata megváltozott, Eredeti: ', @MAPCompany,' Új: ', @MAPCompanyUJ ,'<br>')
									SET @Text = CONCAT(@Text,'Biztosan módosítja!')
									SELECT @Text]]></Message>
          </Question>
        </Control>
        <Control>
          <Type>CancelButton</Type>
          <Name>Cancel</Name>
          <Caption>[#EditFormPanel.CancelButton#]</Caption>
        </Control>
      </Controls>
      <Rules />
    </ControlGroup>
  </ControlGroups>
</Form>

<Form xmlns="http://effector.hu/schema/ns/editform">
  <Caption>Manuális Anonimizálas Indoka</Caption>

        <Required type="Constant" return="boolean" default="true">true</Required>
      </Rules>
      <Controls>

      </Rules>
    </ControlGroup>

        <Control>
          <Type>Button</Type>
          <Name>Group_Save</Name>
          <Caption>Csoportos mentés</Caption>
          <ButtonLooksLike>SaveButton</ButtonLooksLike>
          <Visible type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false"><![CDATA[
			        IF '[##Filter.csoportos##]'<>'' AND '[##Filter.JumpType##]' = 'New' SELECT 'true' ELSE SELECT 'false'
	          ]]></Visible>
          <Readonly type="Simple" return="boolean" default="false">'[##Field.datum##]' == ''</Readonly>

            <ActionType>ProcessResultSet</ActionType>
            <RefreshAfterAction>Component</RefreshAfterAction>
            <CloseScreenAfterAction>true</CloseScreenAfterAction>
            <StoredProcedure>msk_kex_spcsoportosorvosi</StoredProcedure>
          </OnButtonClick>
          <Question type="OkCancel">
            <Condition type="Constant" return="boolean" default="false">true</Condition>
            <Message type="Constant" return="string" default="">
							Biztosan mehet a csoportos kiosztás?
						</Message>
          </Question>
        </Control>
        <Control>
          <Type>SaveButton</Type>
          <Name>Save</Name>
          <Caption>[#EditFormPanel.SaveButton#]</Caption>
          <!--<Visible type="Simple" return="boolean" default="false">'[##Filter.csoportos##]'==''</Visible>-->
          <Visible type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_menu_lathatosag] ('Toborzo','[##Session.UserID##]','[##Filter.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID##]')) = 'true' AND '[##Filter.csoportos##]' = '' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END</Visible>
        </Control>
        <Control>
          <Type>CancelButton</Type>
          <Name>Cancel</Name>
          <Caption>[#EditFormPanel.CancelButton#]</Caption>
        </Control>
        <Control>
          <Type>DeleteButton</Type>
          <Name>Delete</Name>
          <Caption>[#EditFormPanel.DeleteButton#]</Caption>
          <!--<Visible type="Simple" return="boolean" default="false">'[##Filter.csoportos##]'==''</Visible>-->
          <Visible type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_menu_lathatosag] ('Toborzo','[##Session.UserID##]','[##Filter.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID##]')) = 'true' AND '[##Filter.csoportos##]' = '' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END</Visible>
        </Control>
      </Controls>
    </ControlGroup>
  </ControlGroups>

          <KeyColumnDefinition>PeopleID</KeyColumnDefinition>
          <ValueColumn>Name</ValueColumn>
          <Readonly type="SQL" return="boolean" default=""><![CDATA[SELECT CASE WHEN '[##Field.Idvezeto##]' > 0 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END]]></Readonly>
        </Control>
      </Controls>
      <Rules />
    </ControlGroup>
    <ControlGroup name="ButtonGroup">
      <Controls>
        <!--<Control>
          <Type>SaveButton</Type>
          <Name>Save</Name>
          <Caption>[#EditFormPanel.SaveButton#]</Caption>
          <Width>80</Width>
          <Left>180</Left>
        </Control>-->
        <Control>
          <Type>Button</Type>
          <Name>mentes_button</Name>
          <Caption>Mentés</Caption>
          <Width>50</Width>
          <Left>310</Left>
          <ButtonLooksLike>SaveButton</ButtonLooksLike>
          <OnButtonClick>
            <ActionType>ProcessResultSet</ActionType>
            <RefreshAfterAction>Component</RefreshAfterAction>
            <CloseScreenAfterAction>true</CloseScreenAfterAction>
            <StoredProcedure>msk_kex_vezeto_mentes_es_email_kuldes</StoredProcedure>
          </OnButtonClick>
          <Question type="OkCancel">
            <Condition type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false"><![CDATA[
                 if '[##Field.Statuszolovezeto##]' = 'true' AND   exists (select top 1 1 from msk_kex_allasajanlat_vezetok WITH(NOLOCK) where idallasajanlat = '[##Filter.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID##]' and Statuszolovezeto = 1 and Deleted = 0) 
                 begin
                  select 'true'
                 end
              ]]></Condition>
            <Message type="Constant" return="string" default="">Biztosan cseréli a státuszoló vezetőt?</Message>
          </Question>
          <!--<Question type="OkCancel">
            <Condition type="Constant" return="boolean" default="false">true</Condition>
            <Message type="Constant" return="string" default="">Biztosan lezárja az állásajánlatot?</Message>
          </Question>-->
          <Visible type="SQL" return="boolean" default="false">SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT [dbo].[msk_kex_fn_menu_lathatosag] ('Toborzo','[##Session.UserID##]','[##Filter.msk_kex_allasajanlatokID_ID##]')) = 'true' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END</Visible>
        </Control>
        <Control>
          <Type>CancelButton</Type>
          <Name>Cancel</Name>
          <Caption>[#EditFormPanel.CancelButton#]</Caption>
          <Width>50</Width>
          <Left>310</Left>
        </Control>
        <!-- Nem kell a Trigger megolja

        <Control>
          <Type>Button</Type>

          </OnButtonClick>

         -->
        <Control>
          <Type>DeleteButton</Type>

          <Width>50</Width>

      </Controls>

      <ResourceName>MMIDETanacsado</ResourceName>
